review: the bandit would not stay put at all how could it help my lower belly when it kept riding up to the smallest part of my waist it was really frustrating i still wore it for about 4 weeks but measured my lower tummy weekly and it was not getting any smaller so i finally gave up it also got this permanent fold in it that would not go away i suppose if you have zero curves and definitely no butt it might work but it did not work at all for me
i am wearing my bandit now it made my belly get back to it is shape sooner by supporting weak muscles and pushing it it worked for me do measure yourself i have the xsmall even my clothing is xl

i was so excited to get to order this while i was still pregnant and planned to use it from the day of birth thru 6 or 8 weeks i was quite disappointed when it was far from fitting me at the hospital i ordered a cheaper abdominal binder off amazon after a few days of the bb still not fitting me it was great 4 days later i was able to get in to the bb and i was excited to switch I have been wearing the bb for 3 days now and i am still quite disappointed in it it bunches and rides up my back making it completely noticable under even jeans and a tshirt it is incredibly uncomfortable more so than just squishing all my insides laughing out loud I am constantly pulling it down and almost have to re-do it every time i sit / stand up i will say that it does seem to be working with the squishing the belly back down but so did the much cheaper alternative and it was actually semi-comfortable i would definitely recommend the cheaper belt over this one to any of my friends

i was very skeptical about purchasing this but since i needed results fast since i was a bridesmaid in a wedding 2 months post partum i thought i would try it after only one week of wearing this i was able to fit into a few pairs of pre pregnancy jeans and back in my pre pregnancy shirts i am not joking either this product did the job it claims to do it also provided excelent back and tummy support needed after delivering a baby i felt great it is also helping with my stretched out skin and stretch marks i can not say enough good about this product my only gripe is that it buckles and creases after wearing it 24/7 and after washing it does not uncrease oh well it still did it is job and i have confidence only one week post partum get it

i ordered the xl in the belly bandit because that is the size i normally wear when not pregnant i am 510 and an athletic build with a larger bust i felt like i could not get the bandit tight enough to suck me in and it made me really hot i do not know if it is because the belly bandit uses velcro but i just did not feel it was effecient at what it was suppose to be doing i thought my spanx did a better job at holding me in than this and was easier to move around in i think i wore it twice and was over it wasted my money

i bought 2 bandits one small and one xs i worn the small for the first 4 days after delivery 41 inch waist just before labour then i moved on to the xs after 9 days my stomach was flat it is now been 12 days since my baby was born and i have 2 inches to go to get back to my pre-pregnancy waist size 26 inches i found this product very comfortable to wear even to sleep in it is ok to wear under loser fitting clothes but shows under tight shirts
i bought it for my sister and she loves it even thou i did not know much about these things but she mentions that it is a great product very soft not scratchy and make her feel very comfortable

i bought this bandit in the hopes that i could wear it as described the box says to wear it day and night except to shower well it dug into my ribs when i was sitting up in bed nursing and it rolled up under my clothes so it became impractical to wear all the time eventually i just began to forget wearing it so i basically wasted 4500

i want to love this product as i had such high hopes for it based on other reviews I have read however i have tried to use this for a few weeks now and it is just not made for tall women the band does not cover the area it needs to in order to be effective if i wear it low it gives me major back fat and if i wear it high my lower abdomen is completely uncovered i would not recommend if you are tall or have a long torso i am 510 fyi i did buy the correct size i checked it on their website and contacted their customer service department to be sure

waste of money I am hourglass shape trying to get rid of the post baby belly budge and this thing just kept migrating to right under my boobs so uncomfortable how do they claim this is for an hourglass shape no way it is horrible sitting while wearing this only buy this if you have no hips

extremely uncomfortable tried two different sizes but could not wear it for more than 10 minutes at a time it either pushes extra fat out the top or bottom and pinches when i try to sit impossible to nurse while wearing I shall just stick with the eating right / working out to lose the gut which appears to be working fine
sizing on this is completely off does not fit at all did not gain any weight during my pregnancy and had my baby 14 weeks early and still did not fit into the size they said i would

followed the sizing chart diligently and bought it for postpartum by the time it was time to put it on it was too small and i could not return or exchange it if you decide to buy this wait until a week after you give birth

i originally purchased thisin a size small but come to find out only after 24 hours i really needed a size extra small i really love the results I am getting from this product but there are a few things about it that are a bit annoying the material is nice and firm which makes the product really have great results but as your waist is smaller than your rib cage area and hips the band will fold once it folds it has a permanent fold in the band every time you wear it this fold will be present which causes the band to slide up in the back above the butt i continue to wear it but i am constantly pulling it down in the back and it will immediately move right back up my waist line is great just 4 weeks after childbirth i give a lot of credit to this product and breastfeeding but there are just a few annoyances you will have to deal with fyi i wore this 24/7 except for when i showered

shipped quick and product was just as advertised giving 4 stars for the band itself it is grear as long as I am standing and moving but if i sit or lay it rolls up and is difficult to reposition especially if you have a newborn in hand

this did it is job but maybe i expected more it creased right away and the creases never straightened out so it stopped serving it is purpose almost but it did help when i wore it several hours a day i was only able to get about one month use out of it
helped me with lower back support after giving birth highly recommended
really helps my stomach to feel tight and help my stomach to look flat
i got this for my girlfriend because it was on her registry she loved it

I am 2 weeks postpartum and bought this for the flabby tummy i have wide hips and a smallish waist and this thing just will not stay in place every time i sit it rides way up and even bending causes it to slip I have had it one day and think I shall have to return

great belly wrap it does the job you shall see progress in a few days for me i wore this 3days postpartum it did help shrink my tummy in less than a week but then after that it just stays that way there was no more additional progress good quality wrap as well but i think price is too much for something u will only use for say about a month well depends on every woman this is my review

i felt this product ran a little small but it is supposed to be tighter i slept in mine a lot but i found myself waking up in a dripping sweat so i would not recommend wearing at night great to wear around the house and helps things tighten up a bit after the trauma of giving birth
really helped me with my diastasis recti after i had my baby helped so much with back and belly pain from sore muscles after delivery sizing was spot on
returned i purchased as a gift and the person did not want

i ordered large a small was delivered i returned the product if a company can not get this one basic process correct then i am not wasting anymore time on them in the end i was better off not using the band my muscles seem to have recovered pretty well after my cesarean operation the band seemed pretty sturdy but was almost too thick to be comfortable under clothes
cinched ok when not sitting or bending rolled up and gathered / bunched up quickly ok of you have no waist did not work for me at all

I am 10 days postpartum with our second child and i can button my pre-pregnancy jeans sweet sizing note i was right on the border between two sizes so i sized down i had to wait a few days to wear it but it will be more useful to me in the long term
wife bought it and she likes it quite a bit
this product futs great was very snug the first day but as it does it is job and my belly gets smaller it fits better and better

i ordered this based on the companys sizing chart it ended up being a whole size too big after returning and ordering a small i had good results one con would be that the material creases easily and bunches up i ended up rotating the band so that the velcro closure was on the back and it helped somewhat
want to return it does not fit and you can feel and hearvthe velcro while wearing it

one of the reviews i read before purchasing was this stated that the fit was wrong if you use the sizing chart on amazon yes that is correct you will get the wrong size go directly to the belly bandit website and use that sizing chart and you will get the correct size i love this so far only had it for a few days but is helping my back tremendously

i got an extra small since i was between sizes and this fit me a couple days after delivery i do not wear it all the time but i wear it while I am bed it feels really good when i wear it my backs been hurting after the delivery
so impressed by this product very comfortable and it really works well i did not start using it until 5 weeks pp but still feel it was worth the money

yes i had received a package but package was all open i am not happy about i think ais not a newi would like to return then i always buys onlime although amazon if you want me continue to buy then please unopened package or use
i loved the material but the sizing is horrible i bought a large based on the sizing chart i was only about to wear for 3 days after now it is just too loose supports nothing
stretched out within the first week i wore it measured my waste correctly before i bought it and it was still too big within the first few days of wear

bought in large had twins too used one provided by hospital first week and then fit into belly bandit in a large one week postpartum now going on 2 1/2 weeks postpartum I am going to need to order size down this thing really works

i had originally went to the belly bandit website for the sizing it fit just like it was suppose to snug but still able to be velcro shut I am so glad i bought it it helped a lot with core support once i delivered
wanted to love this and use it but it is not true to size runs small and it bends weird and does not lay nicely at all complete disappoinment

i like this belly band a lot and the fit is snug but perfect for what i was looking for i really think this helps a lot with the postpartum healing process too i started wearing it on occasion right after i got home from the hospital from having my son although i did not have a c-section it really helped to reduce the pain i had from cramping in the few weeks after delivery and of course holds in all that extra baby fat and swelling that is still going down after birth my only complaint it that the seam is really thick where the velcro attaches which makes it hard to wear discreetly underneath tighter clothes

i started to wear it two weeks after my c-section until i was about 3 months postpartum it most certainly helped get me back in shape quicker than i think i would have on my own people could not believe how quickly i was back to my normal size
worked well now i need a smaller size

my torso is a bit long so this creates a bit of a muffin top effect i guess if you are squeezing the fat it has to go somewhere right anyhow was using something similar from the hospital after my c section then stopped started having back pain incision pain and pain with stretch marks right under my belly button this added the support i was needing to aid in my recovery one week later and my core muscles are definitely strengthening my stretch marks are smaller and I am almost totally pain free i wear the band as often as i can even to sleep and work out wish i would have continually worn something post c section to aid in healing

i really wanted to try this post baby but it was so awkward and uncomfortable i ended up returning it might work if you have a straighter build against hourglass i could not get it to close properly without either gapping or bunching i decided the money would be better spent toward some workout classes

i really do not like this product it is too short I am 5 7 and it did not cover much of my torso it also is very hot it is uncomfortable and gives you a cylindrical shape with ni curves it also shows under clothing very easily the fabric creases like it said it would but in doing that it makes you look like you have really bad back fat rolls laughing out loud

expands soon could not use after a month i ordered small based on the instruction size chart and it become big after using less than a month i am really disappointed with this product my tummy still looks big and i could not wear the belt as it expanded and not tight enough i would like to get a refund or replacement

this thing is awful it is not long enough for my long torso so it either causes bulges of back fat above it between it and my bra or it fails to hold in the lower part of my belly it rides up like crazy it is incredibly difficult to close the velcro and have it aligned and it has creased making it very obvious under clothing

this worked great i will be ordering again if i get pregnant again i wish i ordered in a smaller size i was going back and forth between a medium and a small i got a medium I am 55 and weighed 160 at the end of my pregnancy the band was too big after a week postpartum and i switched to the bellefit gurdle the product is well made and as described

I am a size 6 pre-pregnancy and only gained weight in the belly i thought a medium would fit according to the size chart but it did not fit after i gave birth it only went around my post partum bellu half way it is way too small
this was way too small and uncomfortable after my c-section i sent it back and continued wearing the wrap they gave me at the hospital

so uncomfortable if you actually have kids to chase around and breastfeed you will hate this thing not to mention it does not breathe and is super hot if you are in summer months or a warmer climate wish i could return it
wish it felt a little more secure but does the job i wish it was not so expensive considering how quickly it became too big yes i went by the suggestions in the measurement guide

this sucks i do not understand why they are so many positive reviews it is over priced and once you buy it you can not return it so you are taking a chance with the tummy band it sucks because of the material it is like plastic and it does not hold it is shape around your back and keeps crinkling you constantly have to readjust additionally it is not wide enough tto give you hip and tummy support which you need postpartum and i am 53 feet i ordered a medium and it fits good save your money and reuse the hospital provided bands or buy the sweet sweat band works just as good

sizing worked perfectly as described this was my first pregnancy so i have nothing to compare it to but i am so glad i bought this and used it postpartum i think it definitely played a large role in being able to return to my pre-pregnancy body i was able to return to pre-pregnancy jeans less than a week from birth
was unable to use and unable to send back which i was not aware of if you have a c section you will need the bamboo one

i bought this for post partum and wore it the day after i gave birth my stomach shrank really quickly so i soon outgrew this it was ok the first few times i worke it but then it became too big and started bunching around my stomach worked well for a while

ordered size xs per sizing chart and it is too small for me 2 days post partum would like to exchange for small without having to buy another but because i bought it in march i can not exchange or return it
ordered according to size chart i could not close it until 2 week post partum did not notice any significant difference with use
would not reccomend i was constantly pulling up on this and it never really worked i would stand up and the whole thing would be below my belly
i realy do love it but i did recomand the smal and i received the medium and now i can not return it to get the smal

i was a size 18 pre pregnancy and ordered the xl i ordered it a week after delivery and i have it as tight as it will go i feel good wearing it and nicely supported after wearing it all day i am ready to take it off at night i wore a support band in the hospital but it made my stomach so itchy the belly bandit does not do this I am glad i bought the belly bandit and i will be purchasing a size down to continue my recovery process
really helps keep things in check to work out and prevent further stretch marks

i am rating based on looks alone because i did not have the opportunity to wear the product i measured at 41 weeks pregnant and was given a size to buy this was entirely too small the only reason i gave 2 stars is because the actual material of the product is nice
helps get uterus and hips back in shape
it is useless it does not help reduce any fraction of inch of my belly after using it for 3 months and it is very uncomfortable to wear
used this with my first baby and again with my 2nd works wonders if you wear it
i love my belly band i feel so much better after i wesr it around the home it is very comfortable and flexible i would recommend for anyone looking to help that baby belly shrink

great product everyone keeps saying that they can not believe i just had a baby i used mine the first day i had my baby in the hospital it was hard to get closed but by day 3 when i was leaving the hospital it was the perfect fit I am 4 weeks postpartum now and still wear it i think it really does help there are so many gimicky products out there for post pregnancy but this one really does help and really does work worth every penny and i will recommend this to all my friends
stiff and uncomfortable very hot in the summer

i had my baby 8 days ago via cesarean and this has been such a help i feel held in and my belly has drastically reduced in size much quicker than with my first I am able to use my abdominal muscles more and do not have to worry about straining my incision i highly recommend this
loved this and used it for the first 3 weeks but then bought the bamboo version which is much softer and easier to wear all day long belly bandit has great products

i measured myself before looking at their sizing chart for 37 inch waist they recommend a size small so that is what i ordered after three days it was already too large to have lasting effects the band definitely works and i started using after two weeks of delivery i like to exchange for an extra small as i love the product and sent seller an email to see if i can exchange for an extra small and waiting on their reply will update you once i hear from them due to material band will crinkle but does not affect results
i was pumped to get this and look slimmer it loses it is shape fast xl was too big l is not just right and medium is too small

i had heard great things about the belly bandit but this was such a bummer it was way to small I am a size 4 6 waist 27 pre pregnancy and around currently while losing weight i know you are supposed to cinch this but you would need a tractor to get this thing to velcro together not sure who they are setting the small to fit

this is a post pregnancy must have began using right after having a c-section in the beginning i had to use all my strength to get the velcrow to touch but within a week i lost three inches this helps tremendously to compress the stomach and jump start your body to feeling somewhat normal again ended up using around the clock for about three weeks until moving to another product by the same maker as the belly bandit became to large it did not stretch out by any means my body just completely changed

I am really bummed I have only worn it a few times and the material seems to have pulled in the middle causing an hourglass shape I am a pretty tiny girl so I am not sure how i could have caused it to do that
product runs small good quality and works great

i started using at about 3 weeks postpartum i wanted to see what size i would need since i knew i would shrink in size pretty quickly and that was fortunate because i probably would have needed to buy two different sizes of the belly bandits i do have a bit of trouble sitting in it so i only wear at night when i sleep I have seen my tummy shrink a little bit so far will see how this works out but so far I am happy with it

do not waste your money on this one get the bamboo one instead i am 127 lbs after i delivered 4 weeks ago with a 28 waste i got the xsmall and it fits fine however it folds so easy and crinkles feels so cheaply made i got the bamboo one and it is so soft and smooth and much more comfortable to wear save yourself the money and go straight for bamboo style

amazing used this for post partum to get my belly back went from 39 in to 315 in in 2 weeks would defin8tely recommend started with a large and got down to a xtra small can not say enough to good things about it

i love the first belly bandit that i got for right after the birth i wore it every day and it was wonderful i did not have one after my first kid and it felt like my guts were going to fall out of me every time i stood up this time with the belly bandit it was much easier to stand up straight even right after birth also my uterus contracted back to normal size in record speed my midwife was impressed my stomach also shrunk much faster and i am pleased with the results once i shrank down to the smallest the first bb would go i decided to get the next size down extra small this was a mistake even although the small is now too large it was time to give up and go for their corset the extra small just rolls up on itself and causes me to look all lumpy from outside my clothes so i can not really wear it anywhere besides the house and the way it scrunches up is uncomfortable
slightly large in circumference and a tad short for a girl my height 510 but overall a quality product
shrunk my stomach in half in a few days
worth every penny wore this for the first week after delivery of my first baby and saw huge results also definitely helped support my back which was awesome

after less than two weeks of using this as directed the band is constantly scrunching up in the middle and riding up the scrunching is so bad that there are now permanent ridges in the middle of the band i really wanted to like this and i think it was working well but i do not know that i can continue using it when it is this uncomfortable due to the bunching
just rides up again and again very uncomfortable to wear gets wrinkles in it the first time you wear it and they never go away i hated this product it did not do anything for me what a joke
if you are thinking about a large purchase a medium the quality of the product is excellent

i wanted to love his product so badly i measured myself at 37 weeks and ordered it right away the moment i was able to in the hospital i put it on within two hours it had folded over and scrunched up and would not go back to it is proper position i also got the kourtney kardashian version which worked out a little better this version is not good for people with long torsos either the kk model later about 2 weeks of 24/7 wear before it just folded too much i looked slim in this while wearing it and almost bought into it too six weeks of round the clock wearing a belly bandit girdle and at 7 weeks the pooch is right back where it was these products are a hoax

i had an emergency c-section and am thankful for this product it not only helped my uterus shrink faster but it decreased the pain i would just put it above the incision so it does not get infected i originally wore a hospital band and it infecfed my incision i definitely plan to use the band in my next pregnancy
must have for postpartum recovery i ordered 2 different sizes to keep wearing as my belly shrunk wore 24/7 starting day 1 after delivery the extra support felt great too

love this product just be aware i gained 33 pounds with my pregnancy i usually fit in a size small it took about a week for my stomach to slim down and than i could put on the belly bandit but I am glad i did not go up in size otherwise it would of been too big better to go smaller than larger

i would not recommend this at all instead I had recommend getting the leggings from this company this band s extremely uncomfortable to wear it was hard for me to bend over because it was so thick and pushed up against my breasts when i sat down and when i breastfed my daughter in the summer definitely do not buy this wayyyyyyyyyy too hot for me i felt like it did nothing and due to how uncomfortable it was i rarely wore it i purchased it at a baby fair and i think it cost about 50 - 60 this was the only thing i splurged on while pregnant what a waste of money i could have spent on my baby

it did get an annoying crease in the very middle of the band within two days of use I am a135 lb before pregnancy 160 at 40 weeks and 58 with a long torso however the band is comfortable and easy to use at three days postpartum i needed my husbands assistance in order to be able to fit in it the next day i was able to put it on my self it works like a charm this was my second pregnancy and at 5 days postpartum I am wearing my size 4 stretch jeans i did not fit into my pre pregnancy clothes after the first child for about 6 - 8 weeks and i was 8 years younger then late20s now I am in my mid 30s and this is amazing to me when i went out for a walk with my newborn my neighbors could not believe how great i looked i do not wear it to sleep I am happy with the results I am getting

this is very comfy to wear all day and all night fit was great especially at first but after about 5 days this folds and bunches and really does not seem to function as intended anymore that is very disappointing considering how it was and also considering i was hoping to wear this 5 - 6 weeks I am not sure this will survive structurally for much more than a week and yes i have the right size yes I am a bit flubbery all the way around but this product is intended to be used post-pregnancy so the target consumer will be all of these things i expected better
i was really excited about this product but i was so grossed out when i noticed it had a brown stain on the inside of the wrap
i have had hard time with the belly bandit the s was kind of small and the m was big i have both
comfortable to wear wish it was wider hope to see some results just got it last week
waste of money even the small size is big and did not work for me save your money
i can not believe i went through my first pregnancy recovery without this it is a must

i ordered 2 after having my first child and i do not feel like it helped at all in shrinking my belly i follow the sizing guidelines and it fit fine I shall admit it was a good support garment because you basically have no core after childbirth and it is probably really beneficial if you have a c section i did not i was fortunate not have much of a belly after he was born in fact i think i have more of one now and I am not sure if it is because i did not wear my belky bandit for the recommended amount of time i was able to tolerate it for 3 weeks day and night not the 6 they say produces the best results it is stiff and does not move with your body it is difficult to wear under your clothes and does not stay in place it requires constant readjusting the worst was at night when it would slide up on my abdomen and squash my sore milk-engorged boobs my biggest complaint is it is not machine washable and if anyone else is like me it would get soaked during my delightful postpartum hormone sweats not fun

i bought a lg initially and have ordered a m now i really am a fan of these received on time and as expected i would recommend i will mention that they do bend toward the top and bottom but i do not think they would be as comfortable if they did not

great for the first month post partum it is easy to put on and take off it is very comfortable and is not to tight that it would make you feel like you are compressed inside of it but tight enough to hold everything in place of course after a few weeks you might want to go tighter or use a waist trainer or something but post partum this one is great
i had a size large from belly banditcom and this size medium was wayyyy smaller than expected it is smaller than the one from the webite

my wife loved it it was very comfortable and did exactly what she wanted it to it help get her baby weight off much faster she said that she was able to get back in her per pregnancy jean in a week and a half with our first baby she was not able to get back into her old pants for a long time after we ended up having to buy a smaller size after the first week because she was dropping the weight and hip size so quickly that the first one we got was too small right after our baby was born she could barely get the larger size on after the week and a half she was about half way through the smaller sized one

extremely dissapointed i started wearing this product immediately post-pardum first off it fit but a couple days later once my belly started shrinking it became to large also it was extremely uncomfortable every time i bent over you could hear the loud crinkling of the velcro embarrassing plus it was visible through all of my clothing and made my stomach look lumpy it was also difficult to put on correctly overall it was a waste of money because after a month i became frustrated and quit wearing it

i actually bought mine at babies r us so i got to try mine on before i bought it i also tried on the babies r us brand but the belly bandit had way more coverage for sizing i went by shirt size pre-pregnancy i wore a large so i bought a medium so it would be a tight fit for better results i went on a protein diet and i have only been wearing it for a little over a month and i already need a smaller size it works really well just wish i could trade it in for a smaller size instead of buying a new one
i always wear a small wore a small all throughout my pregnancy this was tiny had to return
really uncomfortable and bulky the velcro is annoying to mess with

started with a medium right after i delivered my baby and about 3 weeks later i ordered the small that i can now wear for the next couple weeks i was 150 when i got pregnant and gained 30 pounds and now i am 155 and the belly bandit really helped i still have a little pooch that will only go away with diet and exercise
a must have for every women who has recently given birth nothing short of a life saver
i am disappointed by the product the way it sits you can see it under clothes and i do not like the way it fits i was really hoping i was going to love it
way too small and there was no option to change my size i was not happy about that i will be returning this
it pulls up in the back and it can get hot
so nice to use recovering from a c-section nice support
not comfortable at all not happy it is not smooth under clothes makes me laughing out loud bulkier
i bought it tried loving it but it just does not work too well it is very rough and shifts up after a long time wear it did absolutely nothing for me

i have diastasis recti and this helps me feel more stable and put together when I am working out however it is super hard to put on myself and would be better if there were two separate pieces that came across it gets bunched easily when i try to velcro it myself but it is fine if my husband helps it does not conform well to my body although and i get painful red lines at my waistline after wearing it for an hour or so i would also like it a lot more if it were longer and covered my torso completely
it cuts into my back and it does not fit right i can not wear it

i was not able to use right after birth but i was able to use it by the next day it helped significantly with the pain associated with post partem contractions while nursing i made sure to have it on before nursing so i would be in less pain i did not have this device with my first two and i wish i would have it was not comfortable but it did the job i needed it to do

this product really helps with support after giving birth it also helps to smooth and flatten the appearance of your stomach I am not sure about long term results because I have only been wearing for about 15 weeks my only complaint is the fact that you can see the place where the velcro crosses over in the front which you can then see underneath clothes
have had it on for a week and already notice my belly going down in size
way too small and very stiff and uncomfortable could not wait to take it off the first time i wore it waste of money

i love these things i used one for about 6 weeks after delivering my youngest naturally and it really helped with my diastisis recti that never fully healed after my first i only wore it around the house because it did show under clothes but i did not leave the house much those first few weeks anyway he just turned a year and the mama bump that i sported after my oldest 8 is actually gone and i think my stomach almost looks like i never had kids i recommend it to all the mamas i know i received thisat a discount in exchange for my honest unbiased review

worked great for 2 days now it is too big haha which i guess is not a bad thing i got a medium prepregnancy i was 120lbs i weighed 175 at the end and am just now 6 weeks post partum 145lbs the medium is too large now it is snug tightened all the way but not tight enough i will be ordering a small in the near future

it rolls up from the hips is difficult to put on by myself and is not hidden under clothing i think you could probably get the same benefits from a cheaper version this being my first baby i can not speak to if it helps more or not i do like the support it provided for my back and feeling held together
i ordered an xl and it fit for a week belly bandit has a trade in program but i will not be using it after spending 50 i do not plan on spending more to size down when i followed the size chart

since i am currently expecting i am not able to use the product yet but wanted to give an overall feel for the product seems well constructed but very stiff expected the product to have a little give to it to make it more comfortable for using right after childbirth

i wore this for 3 days after i had the baby and immediately the fabric would fold over in the back it was also too big to wear after the first week so now i have to buy another band to keep wearing it was definitely not worth the 50 i paid for it

i had the size medium from my previous pregnancy and decided to get a small as well this time after two days i was able to fit into the small and my stomach is almost back to it is regular size it is recommended to wear this for 6 weeks which i do plan to do because it gives great support
great product wish someone would have told me about it immediately after having my babies not 2 years later

i started wearing this the day after delivery this is my first pregnancy so i am not sure if it helped or not but it made me feel good that i was being proactive so quickly after delivery it is not comfortable enough to wear constantly but i found taking it off to nurse and sleep gave me enough break to keep it on the rest of the time i am 4 weeks post delivery and now only wear it a few hours a day i typically wore an xs-s clothing size pre pregnancy and in maternity clothes and the xs fits well
not worth the money shows from underneath your clothes and slides up better off with a corset
soon as i gave birth i put this on comfortable and helps with swelling
fits as described I am not sure how well it works because it was not comfortable enough or discreet enough to wear outside the house
i love the postpartum support this offers it is great I am not sure how much it helped my belly shrink but the support was good only wish this was cheaper

i found that the belly bandit was too stiff to be able to sit down while wearing i breast feed my little one and could not keep it on while feeding it is too much work taking it on and off with the frequency of sitting it does provide support when standing but could not make it work for me the return policy is not great i bought it ahead of time and by the time i got to try it i was unable to return it i would not recommend this product

I have really loved my belly bandit I am four weeks post partum and my stomach has come back together nicely i followed the size chart on the belly bandit website and I am glad i did i almost ordered a medium because i was borderline small / medium when i initially measured but i went a size down good thing and actually i need an even smaller size I am going to borrow my friends extra small i worked out my entire pregnancy and went back to the gym after two weeks so i think my body shrunk quicker than most so those results may not be totally typical I had definitely say go a size down if you are in between sizes you want it to be tight my friend said her husband had to help her get it on the first few days having the support around your abdomen and back is really nice when your belly is squishy after birth
i followed the size chart but could have gone a size smaller so that i would have more use of the correct size

bought this after reading blogs about binders it works great the website sizing guide said i was an xs glad i did not follow that advice everyday it fits a little better as my belly shrinks i try and wear it all day and night worth the investment

very uncomfortable hot and sweaty under clothing and bunches uncomfirtably when you sit down
i like the product the only thing is that it does not stay in it is place and you have to accommodate it trough the day
it is to big should have gotten smaller size

so happy to have this after my first baby to help me feel more like me again
at first i was worried the size did not fit but after 2 days my tummy went down a bit and i was able to get it on i love it
it is perfect for tucking that extra skin from having a child

i bought thisin anticipation to giving birth to my third child i had read a lot of the reviews and had heard great things about this brand in particular i was very excited to use it and hopefully see results i have been using it for three weeks now starting immediately after birth and I am extremely disappointed with it within the first week of wear it bunched up in back and has never been the same to the point where the crease is aso bent out of shape it is visible through clothing b painfully pushing into my back at this point it is so uncomfortable i can not wear it anymore and because i bought it before i gave birth it is over the thirty day return limit so that was basically 50 down the drain huge huge disappointment
helped me get back into fighting form in no time was helpful to feel strong again in taking care of baby

i had to return it i know some people love it and it may be recommended for c-section but can i make a suggestion get one for free from the hospital i had a c-section and got a hospital grade one that is more stretchy but gives great support i would ask for two sizes one bigger one for when you are still there and a smaller one when your stomach gets smaller do not waste 50 buy some educational toys or books instead

i really like this product seems to have worked pretty well for me seems like it fits a little big although i was a size 6 before getting pregnant with twins i bought a medium 3 days after the babies were born and it was too big i had to order a small instead do not worry they will not take items like this back for sanitary reasons but they did work with us about receiving a product we were in satisfied with

bigger than i expected as far as the support is great especially after c section it supported my back and the flappy extra fat from pregnancy hanging from the incision i was able to walk and take care of my 15 month old toddler and a newborn my healing is definitely a lot better than my first c section with this belly bandit support

i bought this just after having my 8th baby i wore it for three days and it seemed to be making a big difference however i developed a terrible rash with large itchy red welps around my entire waist i stopped wearing it and it has taken 5 days for the rash and itchiness to go away it is made with 75 polyester 25 lycra so I am not sure what my skin reacted to but I am not able to wear it and can not return it so for me this was a complete waste of money

this would be a great product if i was standing a majority of the time it held everything in and you could visibly tell if i had been wearing it during the day or not i would pooch out more if i had not been wearing it for a while as a brand new mom however i did everything i could to stay off my feet when sitting the belly bandit would get pushed up and off my stomach to mash painfully into my tender breasts i used it daily for a week starting two weeks postpartum off and on for another two weeks then almost never after that now 7 weeks postpartum i look pretty much the same as i did before i started wearing it i might have had better long-term results if i had been able to wear it until i could start working out again but it was just too uncomfortable to sit in there has really no curve to this product nor anything to keep it from riding up next time I shall be looking into something that goes between the legs like the bellefit

best purchase I have ever made i started wearing it the day after i had my son and my belly definitly went down alot it also gave me a lot of back support if i was having more kids i would def buy it again i always recommend to my friends

as previous reviewers said you need to doctor it up a little in order for it to fit into the bemis 600 series motor take a dremel tool with a very small round spherical drill bit grind a small groove on one side of the plug between the 2 female plugs about 1/4 long the whole process will take five minutes

you need to cut a groove in the appliance cord end for polarity no big issue for a rotary tool or something with a mild removal effect razor blade i used a 3 cut off wheel tool air powered to make a small groove on the outside of the appliance cord end to somewhat match the end of the old cord and note the polarity wide outlet tang to the same wire on the appliance end to match the groove you need to cut

giving this drawer a 4 because it fit perfectly in my ffhs2612ls4 frigidaire refrigerator shipping was also quick and had no damage only issue is that you have to purchase the humidity control lever separately frigidaire 240362201 slide refrigerator and there are no instructions on how to attach it to the drawer which made things unnecessary frustrating once i figured out how to do it although it was very easy just insert the handle portion of the lever through the back of the left side hole on the drawer give it a little twist until it sits in the hole correctly and then you should be able to snap the right side clips into the right side slider hole
it was a pain and pretty expensive to have to replace a drawer in the fridge but this one fit perfectly was delivered quickly and was the lowest price around worked great

some people have given this product a low rating because it does not come with the slider bar but this is not the fault of the product nor seller that piece is sold separately which could perhaps be made more clear but that is a standard practice if you look up the parts to your refrigerator you will see that each and every piece is sold separately if you want the slider you have to order that and connect it yourself this product is exactly like the one i am replacing so i gave it a high rating the only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because it is made of plastic and cracks fairly easily hence the reason i had to replace it

I have been looking for a compact sewing box kit to have around the house i can not count how many times I have needed to sew on a button or fix a piece of clothing only to find that I have misplaced the string or the needles this set is perfect because everything you might need in a clothing emergency you will find in this set it comes with 24 different colors of thread 30 needles and a bunch of buttons safety pins and little tools i love that the box folds out the way it does it makes it easy to open up the little compartments or choose which spool of thread to use i received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review in my opinion this is a great kit to have around the house i will definitely be buying one for my mom

this little compact foldaway is so cute it is compact but not super small it has everything you need for simple repairs and stitching garments i love using this sewing box it has all the normal colors that would be needed for just about everything has a few different types of needles and has other pieces to fix buttons latches and more i received this product for my honest review the price is extremely worth the product i recommend this to anyone and everyone it should be a necessity for everyone is home

i got this product at a discount for my unbiased review these views are my own i love this little box it compact but opens up to has so many thing anyone would need to fit a garment i was surprised at how many thing can in this little box from buttons to pins to hooks i was impressed i would give this as a gift to anyone whom is moving out for the first time of travels a lot
love wverything it came with perfect if you need an emergency kit for your car or office perfect just to have next to the machine as well very handy

the smartec compact foldaway sewing box kit is a cute little kit that contains the essentials to do minor repairs like sew a button back on or replace a snap but the sewing scissors that came with it are more a childs size than useful the small spools of thread that came with it break easily the plastic case seems brittle and would probably break if bumped or dropped and the sliding plastic closures are difficult to close once you have opened it i could not call this a serious sewing kit the size and brittle nature of the it is plastic construction would make it a poor choice as a travel kit and i would be very leery of giving this to any child due to the number of small easily swallowed accessories it contains if you need to buy agift for someone then this will work for you the rest of us might want to continue shopping aroundprovided at discount for my honest evaluation no obligations my review is based upon my examination evaluation and actual experience in using the product

i had a box that was this same design back in the 70s and 80s it finally broke down due to old age and much use so when i saw this one i was excited to be able to replace it this is not the same it just looks the same it is a scaled down child size version of the real thing the outside slot in this one will barely hold a slim note pad in the original the outside slot was big enough to hold 1 or 2 full sized sewing patterns the spools of thread in this one are teensy toy spools just enough thread on each one to sew on a couple of buttons the original held full sized spools of sewing thread if you want a stocking stuffer for a child fine but anyone who has any sewing acumen will scoff at this ridiculous gimcrack being called a sewing kit

I shall start by explaining that i have a 2009 toyota corolla and was looking to upgrade to an hid system these cars have two sets of headlights there is a dedicated low beam set and a driving / high beam set i got the low beam switched out pretty easy with 9006 8000k single beam hid system i looked up the type of bulb for the driving high beam set and it was 9005 so i ordered a 9005 hid system thinking it would be an easy swap like the low beams nope after installing that system they flickered and did not get bright for the high beams after further investigation i discovered that toyota is using a voltage change to achieve the difference in brightness obviously this will not work for hid so then i decided to find a white as possible halogen bulb well when i got these bulbs i was under the impression that they would be whiter and or brighter than stock do not let the blueof the bulbs fool you they not only do not shine blue they do not even act like they are closer to cool white than stock now they are brighter but not whiter kinda disappointed

bought this for my central ac unit outside that had a lot of mashed spots there were no instructions on how to use this or put it together so i had to youtube it it looked easy the way the guy just combed through the fins but when you actually go to do this unless your fins are only slightly askew you are going to get stuck i ended up just sitting there using the comb for over an hour on the spots and eventually noticed that the individual combs started to break or get bent it is plastic and not very sturdy plastic at that after losing 3 prongs i just ended up getting a small thin blade and using the flat side to coax the dents out worked better than this fin straightener pros well it works for a bit cons cheap plastic bottom line if the fins you are trying to fix are only slightly out of shape then this would be easy to use but if you got some big dents and a lot of them you should look for one that has metal prongs or just get thin sturdy blade and spend a bit more time and patience

classic and elegant describes this accoutrement to comfortable seating allowing ventilation of what was once a hot leather office chair it transforms the office chair into a vintage antique work of art the blond beads contrast with the black leather background and evoke a celebration of days gone by the caning and stitching are impeccable originally purchased with theof detaching the seat from the back i decided to leave it intact to allow even greater comfort and ease of movement i did not notice or find that there is an elastic strap to hold it to the back of the chair until days later with all due apologies to j peterman

worked fine on my 2000 4runner my recommendations use the clamp method 2 shop clamps not too tight low pressure only need to pump to 5 psi do not put brake fluid in the bleeder use it for pressure only remove old fluid from mc refill install adapter pump to 5 psi adjust as required to hold pressure bleed brake furtherest from mc rear pass side use care not to completely drain mc break seal refill mc and repeat took 30 mins to do all 4 wheels taking my timedid not spill a drop when i did this job 1 year ago i put brake fluid in the bleeder and it leaked at the mc despite passing an initial pressurecheck i also have a 2005 miata for which i have the correct mc adapter threaded even so i prefer to just use the bleeder as a pressure source and continually add brake fluid to the mc as i work my way around the vehicle added benefit no clean up of bleeder required update 2 - 2 - 2018 built this rig and now use it with the power bleeder see pic this works way better holds pressure no leaks again just using as a pressure source 5 - 10 psig i depressurize and refill for each wheel quick and efficient keep level above low level in your mc

first things first get rid of that j hook and chain if you want to keep your sanity if it was not for a reviewer who posted he used clamps instead of the hardware that came with this i would have literally thrown this out no joke the seal just would not happen on a 1999 toyota corolla to even allow proper pressures to hold and it required all this fiddling and screwing for nothing i guess i just could not believe the manufacturer who sells an otherwise excellent product would include something that would not work with that out the way i went to my local hf store picked up 2 inexpensive clamps and man i was amazed at how well it turned out it even seals better than my 1107 requires little fine tune turns to seal does the only downside to using the clamps is not having clearance around the mc to use the clamps but if you do the go for it

this has to be the biggest pos i have run into in a long time no matter what i did it leaked and leaked i removed and cleaned several times tried every position and placement imaginable and when i was done had a puddle under my car and brake fluid all over everything in between suspension a complete waste i will be returning this for sure

the picture shows a male and female hose fitting along with two hose clamps those are not included with the 1101 adapter that i received you must have the two fittings to be able to cut your existing powerbleeder hose then be able to use both your existing adapter and the universal adapter 1101 the powerbleeder does not have a compatible fitting that this will connect to

works well as long as there is a decent flat portion of the body of the master cylinder to hook a chain underneath you will also need space above the master cylinder cap to place this on top tighten it a lot or you will get a slow unnoticeable stream of brake fluid running out of it i noticed by the pool of brake fluid underneath the car then had to crank the wing bolts another 4 - 5 rotations each worked great on 2010 honda fit did not work at all on 2012 camry due to the cap-side of the master cylinder slanting upward meaning the chain would slide right off during tightening this is not the adapters fault I am not sure i could get any adapter to work on that darn thing instead i used a pneumatic air bleeder which works but it is waaaay slower but again it works pneumatic air bleeders do not work on all cars because they do not create a lot of suction pressure

works better than expected use it a a dealership one man job

worked well on my old toyota supra the plastic adapter plate and rubber gasket are thick they are able to withstand a reasonable amount of clamping pressure without warping it helps to use some silicone or synthetic-based grease on both faces of the rubber gasket to maintain a good seal i was able to achieve up to 15 psi without any issues the chain and j-hook clamp can be a bit fiddly but not too bad i use the motive system for air pressure only so i was frequently taking the adapter off and putting it back on as i topped off the reservoir during a complete flush of the brake lines i could only wish there was a toyota-specific adapter that might have made the process a little quicker

it is not very easy to use on my 07 g35 since it is a universal cap it does not seal 100 the metal chain that goes around the brake and clutch fluid reservoir to create the seal works but the reservoirs are not perfectly flat on the bottom to prevent the chain from moving therefore the chain can move loosening the tension and breaking the seal i would recommend to either pump the brake and clutch pedals the old fashion way to get an actual cap for the vehicle you are working on to make sure there has an appropriate seal brake fluid is very abrasive and having it spill all over the paint is not good which is what happened to me

good jeep cherokee cup holder who ever says they suck no they do not took less then 2mins to put in my 1988 jeep cherokee also they hold med cups like from mcdonalds i only got it for it to put a cup in it to dip works good and i order it last friday and just got it today not bad shipping well packaged also will order from again soon thank you
perfect fit fast shipping good packaging makes the crv standout with these slim but stylish deflector followed directions and some quick you tube videos

i was looking for something to enable me to leave the windows open without the rain coming in on rainy days i have a big dog that needs much window space as possible after some tweaking and ligth pounding the items began to fit well while allowing the windows to fully close when wound up

i filled in the information online to determine if these weather tech deflectors would fit my 2012 honda crv the website came back with a green check and indicated they would fit my car i ordered based on that information when the deflectors arrived they did not fit the car even after sending the vendor a screen print of the window showing the items would fit i still had to pay the freight to return the deflectors i ordered honda oem deflectors online they fit great and look fantastic

would have given a 5 star rating because i think the fit could be just a little better the design is great and it stops the rain really well and matches the look of my crv black i just think it could have been made to fit into the corners a little better

thisdoes not fit 2012 crv too bad because i love the weather tech side vents noticed that amazon still advertises them for this model looks like more people will be disappointed and have to return them at their own expense

i wanted the side window deflector that went in the window channel and these did that and so easy to install love them and great here in fl as i can now leave my windows cracked and not worry about rain getting in well one of the rear deflectors is missing off my car and now weather tech tells me theyweathertech custom fit front and rear side window deflectors for honda ridgeline dark smoke did not come from them yes it did and if i want to replace it i will have to buy a pair expected that but 55 and i only had it on for one month
i was very impressed with this product great quality perfect fit i would highly recommend this product to anyone satisfaction guaranteed

I have purchased weathertech products since 2005 and they are consistently high quality this product is no different i even got a great deal although the amazon warehouse deals it said it was used but the only thing i saw that was slightly off was the box wrinkled and shelf worn the weathertech product was in new condition and it installed with no problem whatsoever functionally you can drive with your windows down to the level of the deflector or slightly lower and not get that huge rush of wind and attendant noise that comes with it you can also leave your windows cracked open so the heat escapes when it is parked and to everyone else from the outside it looks like the windows are up dark tint

the front deflectors fit well but they tend to rattle when the wind hits them just right the rear deflectors are terrible since they do not prevent water from entering in a 2010 honda cr-v the problem is the honda rear window design is not suited for rain deflectors i left the rear window deflectors in however since weather tech would not offer my installer a partial refund note that the metal clips that are used on the rear deflectors have permanently damaged the rubber trim on the windows be careful how you install them so you do not bend the rubber window trim eventually the rear deflectors kept coming loose and kept falling off so i eventually removed them bottom line i recommend that you do not buy the rear deflectors on a honda cr-v i also bought a pair for my wifes 2014 honda civic 4-door lx and the right passenger deflector is constantly coming loose and falling out of the window after 1 year

i received a different brand of window deflector for christmas but knew that i really wanted the weathertech product i ended up purchasing these deflectors at a great price through the amazon warehouse as a product that would come in a damaged package yes the package was damaged but the product was undamaged i have not installed them yet but have no doubt they will work great i really like the fact the front windows do not require any adhesive to keep them in place weathertech makes some great products

front door shades installed easily w / easy to follow directions rear door shades had to have about 1/16th of an inch removed from the rear tab for proper fit and even then did not really fit the contour of the window opening the first time the right rear window was opened after apporximately 30 hours the shade fell in the street a little more trimming of the rear tab and it fit well enough to hold for the past two weeks i expected a better fit from this manufacturer

2010 cr-v ex-l the front deflectors do not stay attached i have received replacements followed the online video and talked to tech support they are installed correctly they stay on for a couple weeks but when the climate heats up in birmingham al and you close the door firmly the visors fall off the left visor has fallen off driving down the road yet when installed they feel very solidly attached they are priced right look wonderful and i am so against paying honda 230 plus labor to install the honda version but since these were a gift for my fiance i have no choice bottom line the front deflectors do not stay in i have an acura tl the weathertech visors i installed stay in and look good i have a pt cruiser the weathertech visors i installed stay in and look good
came as described very good classy quality and fits really well 2008 honda cr-v easy to install it just took me 10 minutes overall nice deflector

like user james f wadford in a previous review i too received the visors in terrible condition there are deep scratches on all 4 visors and the front visors both seem to have fingerprint-like imprints in the plastic itself worthy of note the underside to all 4 visors are super clean and clear with no scratches i returned the first set and asked amazon for a replacement which i received the replacement is in worse shape there has even white film of dust on the underside of all 4 visors but none on the outside facing surface one bad batch is understandable 2 products with the exact same problem speaks to a bigger problem i returned the replacement and will look for different visors for my vehicle

when used with the included sticky rubber mat this holder securely holds my iphone or garmin nuvi gps the dashboard on my honda odyssey has a nice flat spot that it can sit very stable the material of the holder is a foam so it will not damage your electronics and you can easily squish it into your glove box too the stickiness of the rubbery mat is a downfall as it attracts dust and dirt if you would like to see additional pics of this holder please see the ones i posted in the photos section

whether this works for you depends largely on what type of car you drive it seems to work better in my car than in my husbands but the dashboards are totally different even in my car i did have some trouble with this falling when i accelerated quickly or took a sharp turn also it really is not an attractive device in any way but when it works it gets the job done people may want to try something like this before getting one of the mounts you need to attach or suction-cup to your window

this was a decent product it sits on the dashboard and holds a portable gps it allows your hands to be free for driving i find it handier for holding an ipod than a gps on the negative side it is a large block of foam sitting on the dashboard which i do not like but if that kind of thing does not bother you go for it there are several well-placed holes for running cords through it also came with a sticky pad for the dashboard to keep things from sliding

i was truly hoping this might be a viable solution when traveling through states which do not allow for windshield-mounted gps units i have tried vent-mounts previously with relative success but found turning corners to be an issue when the vent-mount would swing away from view the concept of the commutemate navcup is a good one the execution of the concept however is poor first the cradle will accomodate only the thinnest of gps units which rules out the use of my navigon gps second in spite of power cord cut outs in the cradle for routing the cord they will not accomodate a standard length micro usb jack in the bottom of one of my gps units to say nothing of the offset micro usb jack on a secondary gps unit i own the cost of return shipping does not make it cost effective to return so perhaps my review will spare another from making an unnecessary purchase i think if heininger holdings would redesign the cradle they may have a good product on a positive note the dashgrip mat that came with it should be useful for securing loose items on my center console
would not stay on dashboard ended up using them in the home for my iphone 4

i have been looking for a holder that would allow me to access my touch screen the dashboard models are difficult to reach this really does the trick

there has nothing to using this tool out of the box unpack place the sticky pad on the dash put the navcup on it and you are off to the races i live in a mountainous area with lots of inclines and downgrades and turns in all the time I have been using the navcup my motorola droid has never slipped out in any direction the gps which is quite a bit larger than the droid also has never slipped out regardless of speed or direction of travel everything stays in place as if it were glued on bear in mind that this is during the height of winter and everything in the car is cold i wonder what it will be like during summer highly recommended for now update 05/17/2012 lo these many years and this thing continues operating very well the heat did not faze it one bit the rubber mat is accumulating dust rather quickly now and so requires a good clean from time to time otherwise spot on upgrading to a five-star review it deserves it

it does a pretty good job but it is pretty big and bulky to put on the dashboard we put our in the console area down below and it works just fine pros keeps the phone upright we use our phone with gps for navigation has a spot where you can place the charging cable through cons too bulky and light to place on the dash without concerns of it falling off the stickypad that comes with it is very sticky and i do not want it leaving a residue on the dash wish it did not hold the phone / gps so upright since we use it down in the console area it would be great if it were angled back a little bit

looking for a stable holder for your gps device this is the thing for you I have got a tom-tom gps system and i was very pleased at how well this worked with it it held it in place firmly but was it was still easy to remove there has also a hold to allow your power cord to go through so you can have it plugged into your car lighter like anyone uses those for their intended purpose anymore the holder itself is made out of a black foam substance and sits easily on the dashboard really there has not much more that i can say about this thing it is sturdy and it gets the job done

i am not a short person but when my gps is mounted to the windshield of my suv i do have toway forward in my seatbelt to change anything on the screen the navcup puts the gps within easy reach of the driver and lowers it out of your line of vision [ which could be a good or bad thing depending on your preferences and level of distraction often when at eye level drivers find themselves watching the screen rather than the road ] in the event of a wreck the gps unit may go flying as it is not secured beyond it is power cable but the soft navcup will not because harm to passengers the pad mounts easy just slap it down and sit the cup on it

mmmm i one of these light bulbs an i tested with my white reg lights an it show a different on them on my high beam that is were i put them because i drive at night i have a night shift but not bad at all for this product lot better then my old ones

these lights are amazing they are very bright and have a good purple tint to them they are also legal so that is good too

i purchased these 9005 along with 9006 halo these are very low powered headlights i like the 9006 low beam they work fine but these 9006 hi beam are the dimest headlights i have ever seen and i m 52 years old i have went out of city limits 5 or 6 times to try these lights and they are just plain useless i had to put my old lights back in till i recieve different lights i would sell these but they would be a hazard to use

these lights are just plain garbage you might be able to use them in the city where there is lights and speeds are slow but to use these out of city and where speeds increase is not safe they hardly light up the road at all and only for a very very short distance i tried to adjust them but they just do not put out any light almost like trying to drive in the dark with your lights turned off i will not try to drive with these purchased a differnt brand guess these will go in the trash

got these 48 hours after ordering really easy to install nice fit a really good cheap alternative to buying complete upper doors

good fitment get them warm first before trying to install

be careful you get what you pay for these are cheap quality look good after installing but next time i will spend the extra money and get a better set of door uppers no instructions included either which was disappointing but youtube has a couple of helpful videos thank goodness

i particularly wanted rampage door skins to match my rampage top unfortunately the door skins were too small to fit on my 1999 upper door frames even although i followed the instructions and left them to bake and stretch for several hours in the florida summer heat and sun despite multiple attempts i was not able to get more than one of the four corners to fit on the frame at the same time i finally gave up and took advantage of amazons excellent return policy and returned these i subsequently purchased the smittybilt door skins and they fit easily on the upper door frames
as others have said after the actual struggle to get them on they are great
very good product fits really well i read a lot of reviews on these and a lot of people had problems with install but they went right on and fit great i did not have any problems

they did not fit i heated them and stretched them they even ripped and they still do not fit properly on the stock door frame they are not nearly as high quality as the original jeep skins and windows but they are adequate for the price and i would have given them 5 stars if they actually fit the frames

ok so here is my say on these it is a great looking product but i feel it can be manufactured way better to not rip in certain areas hands down quick but painfull assembly buy them pre fabricated on the frames and save yourself the anger and hassle
