this turned out to be a horrible purchase and a 100 thrown away i am so disappointed in this product i bought it to give it a try and the photos turned out to be grainy and just utter garbage it is hard to focus with this camera and to keep anything in focus i use a good tripod and a shutter release and i still get horrible photos another thing with this lens is that a ring on the outside of this device came undone i have to push it back to be able to focus it seemed it was glued on so if you are looking for a lens please pass this one up you will just waste your money do not go cheap on your lens and they should treat you right i am not sure if i can do anything about this lens but i plan on saving up and purchasing a better lens for my canon rebel t3

i tested this lens extensively on a nikon d40x with tripod mount and self-timer set to eliminate vibration the resolution is poor at all settings use this lens if you want to take a series of fuzzy images that could not possibly be displayed in addition there is no option to control the aperture or depth of field

the lens is a small reflecting telescope cassegrain no aperture diaphragm fixed f/8 manual focus you will be able to take some interesting telephoto shots given the right conditions for the price of the opteka i have no complaints check prices on real 500 mm telephotos

very poor quality images images taken with this lens have a very low contrast the bokeh looks really weird never really seems to be in focus but that may be due to the poor contrast on a positive note it is very portable for a 500 mm

i got the lens within a few days looks great and i can not wait to use it however i went to put it onto my camera and it will not attach very disappointing now i have to hope an adapter exists i have a canon eos xs which it should fit into
you can read all opinion it is cheap easy to handle and with a regular quality the only issue is you need a lot a lot of light

i got this lens today and tried to shoot some pictures using tripod outdoors it is very difficult to focus even wioth tripod even after focusing my pictures came out soft this is not the lens for action pictures it is well built and hence is a great paper weight 47th photo which suppleid through amazon is charging 15 restocking fee for returning thisi decided to bite the bullet and return this

i bought this lens to have something beyond my 55 - 250 tele-lens similar to other reviewers i was not quite aware of the fact that I had buy a little telescope that said i am very happy with the solid barrel and the optical properties of the lens you will need to use some sort of support although best a tripod otherwise you will end up with blurred pictures i took some amazingly sharp and big images of the moon but due to the slow speed even a picture of venus will be blurred not to speak about faster moving stars the lens performs quite well in bright daylight but you do need to have a good tripod
this is a cheap way to get a 500 mm telephoto lens for my canon t1i nice compromise until i can get a nice stabilized zoom lens that goes up to 500 mm

if you want a 500 mm lens you can spend 4 figures on a canon lens or you can buy one of these for less than 1/10 the price obviously you are going to get better results from the canon and if you want to sell your photos this is going to be useless it has not got any bells or whistles no autofocus no image stabilization so you are going to need a tripod too i would characterize the results from this lens as barely acceptable sometimes but still if you wanted to take professional style photos you were not going to get that from a 90 500 mm lens

i bought this lens when i first bought the camera i did not know any better it is a shame that good lens are so expensive but after a year of using the camera i think it is best to wait until you can aford a better lense i am a beginner at photography but without a stablizer built into the lens i can not get a clearly focused photo without a tripod also without auto focus it is only good for still shots jmho

i was a little naive in the purchasing of this lens i went around and asked a lot of different sources on getting a relatively inexpensive telephoto lens beyond 300 mm they all said the same thing there is no such thing if you go cheap you are wasting your money they were right i was extremely disappointed in this lens if you think you are going to freehand this without a tripod there is no possible way to do it if you set it up against something stationary it is still going to because a snowy white image you have to use your tripod or the shot is wasted the quality of the photos would rate approximate 6/10 they generally appear a little darker with quite a bit of grain it is nice and compact in design but if you care about the quality in photos stay far away from this lens
these are great headsets with mic great fit great sound great price would buy again
the price was right but once i received i discovered the connections were rca and not usb so it does not connect to my laptop any suggestions other than sending back

this headset is totally perfect for my purpose it fits well can be loud enough and has a inline volume controller and microphone on / off switch the sound quality is totally perfect for the price the mic can be adjusted the whole thing fits in a small place only problem i seem to see is that at the very minimum volume one ear shuts off overall i would rate it as a good purchase
these headphones are not usb although they work ok a little uncomfortable with the standard audio jacks it did not state clearly the connection type at the time i ordered

purchased for telephony needs at work where did not need a usb set not very comfortable with two ridges of hard plastic that dig into the top of the ear will have to pad these sections with cloth or tape

i was looking for an inexpensive usb headset for voip and saw this one at amazon the specifications are very vague and nowhere does it mention the type of connector it uses even the picture seems to cut-off any clues to the type of connector used i had to go to the logitech website and dig through their specs to find out it does not use usb to connect to your pc but mini rca connectors i think this should be mentioned prominently to avoid confusion and purchasing the wrongthe price seems fair although

I have bought this headset for myself 2 years ago and I have been using it pretty often ever since it is light comfortable and works great the sound is very clear and the volume settings are high enough my mom needed one now so i bought the same logitech headset for her she loves it as well you are getting a really great product for the money

i purchased this product almost 2 years ago and used it regualrly it worked well and finally after 2 years it started to give me some problems since it worked well for that long i purchased exactly the same product again this time it works well and is very comfortable to use
great sound quality it is comfortable on ears too the only thing i could ask for is a little small frame it is a little too big for me an adjustable one was welcome

i bought this product two days ago and the mic does not work at all i can hear clearly through the headphones but the computer does not pic up a sound from the mic i checked everything went through a ton of tests and options and nothing works never buying something like this again

the microphone broke after less than 2 weeks of use i purchased this headset to talk with my friends online and now i can not because all they hear is godawful screeching as the microphone is somehow broken this is a terrible product spend the extra few dollars and get a better headset it makes me sad because this is the first logitech product that i have ever been really disappointed with
it works pretty well it sits comfortably on your head and the voice quality is very good

logitech 981 - 000074 880 pc headset please do not trust this product bcos i thought logitech as a brand is worthy product regardless of the price we pay for it i use to voice chat n use voip service i just bought couple of months back suddenly voice output is worst other end can hear only if u scream out of your lungs

this microphone / headphone combo is really great it is affordable and effective the mic is bendable so it can adjust however the headphones do not adjust to size of your head and they are really big so they slip off my head alot and I have got an average sized head there is a conrol panel on the cord so if you are so lazy that you can not find the button on the computer which you are attached to by the cord you can just press buttons on the cord itself which is convenient and nice overall this product is good for conversing online as a friend but not for much more than that four out of five stars

logitech 981 - 000074 880 pc headset i purchased this product in may 2006 for my voip account i paid 2500 from staples at he time i frequently buy online at amazoncom and wanted the product the same night to make this long story short this product works great it is reliable and portable can be used to enhance volume as well as sound on laptop and mp3s have new voip account today apr13th 2009 house phone making weird noise i tried these headphones and adjusted the settings on pc tested it on my cel for sound and it worked great i highly recommend this product and highly recommend amazoncom they are awesome and have saved me a ton of money and are reliable well worth the price i paid irma

these work fine but he previous set i had from logitech were much more comfortable these may be good for kids but they do not sit well on me they always seem to be in the wrong position and fell like they are always there pressing against me i wish i knew the previous model but it is not listed on the headset i travel enough that i do not expect these too last over 6 months they feel cheap next time I shall pay more to get a better headset

i have a dell laptop with bluetooth built in i connect devices to the dell often with no problems however the s-2 just plain does not connect to the dell with any reliability when it does it sounds great but the frustration level in trying to connect just makes it not worth the effort i would blame the dell but it does connect just fine to other devices so i have to conclude that the issue is with the s-2 i tried to get so me help from the manufacture but never got a response to my repeated requests for help again nice sound but just not reliable

i was looking for a replacement bluetooth headset for my iphone previously i had a motorola s9 paired with an icombi ap21 i got both at amazon well after 3 months of use the buttons on the s9 got stuck so that i couldt increase the volume I have read that this has been a common concern for many other people as well i looked at the bluetrek st-1 the sony drbt21 g and the cardo s-2 all three were within the same price range a cnet review of the cardo made me buy them in comparing them to my old s9s the sound quality is excellent i was a little apprehensive because I have gotten used to the small buds on the s9 but the earpiece is very light and comfortable overall a great product and i would recommend them to friends

it took me 2 hours to figure out how to configure the headphones with my vista 64 os but finally i did and it works like a charm with decent listening quality update the headphones are too flimsy and broke on me now i have to use tape t hold it together

I have owned the cardo s-2s for about 4 months during that time they received light use i would estimate total listening time to be about 40 hours the s-2s were used mostly for listening to audio while exercising i found the lag while watching video to be a bit annoying the sound quality was good not great but good battery life was excellent they never went dead i would always recharge at about 4 hours i did not abuse these headphones and had they not broken after 4 months of light use i would rate them 4 out of 5 stars

this piece of junk broke almost immediately it is designed so poorly that after only 2 or 3 uses it will break right at the piece that joins the ear piece to the part the wraps around your neck this prevents it from no longer staying securely on your ears i was extra careful with it two after reading several other reviews about it being week but it made no difference the sound is good but the quality of the product design it terrible if the price drops to 5 i would say buy otherwise avoid this product completely this is not worth the price
i like this headset works great and easy to connect not very loud and can become uncomfortable if wearing for a long time overall i think it is a good buy
the headphone plastic cracked and broke a couple of months after i bought the

i bought these to make my life easier at the gym by not having wires hanging off my head when i exercise the sound is pretty good the range is decent it connected to my ux380 easily i like that they fold it is what sold me one them top begin with although i worry about the durability of the plastic we shall see about that i have tried not to expose them to too much sweat so i can not attest to their sweatproofness or lack thereof i am please with my purchase although

this cardo bluetooth headphone works well inside a vehicle or indoor outdoor it pick up many other interference reception becomes poor when i turn my body might loose the signal inside vehicle no problem the elbow where it folds the plastic joint can seperate causing ultimately internal wires become torn will not charge and no longer function

i use these extensively with both my blackberry curve 8320 and pearl 8120 for both phone and music listening i also paired with the jabra a120 adapter easily sound quality is great compared to the two other comparable bluetooth stereo headsets that i have tried not as good as my sony dr-bt50s but much easier to travel with no complaints about the mic when using the phone the controls are well placed and easy to use once you are familiar with them the headset is comfortable to wear for extended use my only complaint about them would be that they are a bit on the flimsy side and seem like they would be easy to break
cons you look like mickey mouse wearing these headphones pros best bluetooth phones out there for the money

i paired it with a verizon palm 700wx works perfectly no complaints sound is very good having the controls right on the headset is very conveinent essentially i am controling windows media player with it the microphone is also very good no complaints from people on other end most do not know i am on a headset at all range is great also almost to good make sure bluetooth is disabled or unit is turned off when your charging or not using charge seems to last me two 2 works days of intermittent use which for me means several hours of music listening and stand-by time
wow better than expected the sound is clear there is no skippin of music and they fit very well quite pleasantly surprised

this product is in a league of it is own very comfortable and it stays securely on your ears with the unique design of the ear clips easy to use and setup just have to follow the instructions can be paired with as many bluetooth devices you have to use sound is excellent the only set back i have is i can not get it to recognize my voice when using voice activated dialing which is minor because i did not by it for cell phone use but is crystal clear as handsfree device really good sound for stereo use and for those who have to stay up late watching tv

i am enjoying great sound quality using my cardo s-2 bluetooth headset for the mp3 player part of my phone however when phone calls come in the sound for the people on the other end is poor and i have to switch back to using the phone to talk otherwise this is a beautiful set of earphones

i have a cannon rebel t3i i love my camera and want to protect it but this did not fit at all it is a good concept but it did not work out i should have know seeing that it was only 10 bucks i simply threw it out

yes I am one of those persons walking around with a silver camera xsi no i never have liked silver cameras but i got it from my sister so it was not entirely my fault i mean it is almost better than nothing anyway i got this armor not to protect my camera but because it looks a whole lot better than bare silver granted it does not make the camera awesomely black but at least i can say i tried without braking the bank it does add to the grip a bit as well so if you liked silver then found out after the fact that it was not really in this is a good way to cover your mistake trust me there are not a whole lot of people out there dying to buy your silver camera or trade for black so go head and at least try it

this body armour does the job of protecting my rebel xsi but i have a few complaints in installing it one rubber piece snapped because it is really skinny and was extended too much as i was fitting the body armour on my camera it is the piece that goes between the flash and the dial it is really skinny and fragile overall the armour is not snug enough i was expectibg it to really be a snug fit arond the camera body it is not the case it is a little too loose and you feel you do not have a good grip of the camera because of it the bottom piece holds to the rest of the body armour with rubber tabs these tabs keep coming out and i have to constantly put the tabs back in place feels really cheap but it is inexpensive after all the lens hood protector pice does not fit a 77 mm as advertised the bottom pice has to be completely taken out to replace the battery so yes inexpensive but you get what you pay for
i bought this as a gift for a friend thedoes not fit the camera well and it was a tad bit embarrassing to watch as the recipient struggled to get it onto his xsi it also made the camera a dust magnet
i am more than happy with my purchase of the camera armour there is no better way to keep scratches and dings from a camera and the price was definitely right

the products company said it best you will get a case for your 20000 cell phone but not your 150000 camera that convinced me i got this and it is great the fit is a little loose but it is fine it will protect it way more than before buy this if you want a good case at a decent price
the fit on the camera is a bit awkward but once you get it on it covers a lot i have a canon t1i and the armor covered the light sensor plus the lens cup on the front blocks the flash if you use it

i bought this for my girlfriends camera after much difficultly we finally got the thing on the camera only to find the armor blocked access to some features and would not stay tight around the body it sounded like a goodbut the final product is shoddy and not worth the money we have already thrown it out

this does fit my canon xsi quite well a little bit tricky installing but now it is on lens installation was not hard either i really just wanted something to protect the body from bumps scratches a previous post complained about having to remove it to replace the battery personally it seems quite easy to remove the bottom plus my battery tends to get several hundred pics so i do not see it to be a huge deal i do not see myself using the rubber lens hood for less than 10 i think it is a bargain

i purchased the camera armor through amazon for my canon xsi last year at the same time that i bought my new camera i have been very disappointed in the camera armor it does not fit my camera well the armor makes it difficult to operate some of the features on the camera the extensions on bottom piece easily slip out of the slits in the main part of the armor that are intended to hold it in place the bottom piece of the armor falls off easily this is aggravating the part that would protect the lens is bulky and i have not been using it some areas of my camera specifically the led screen and the pop-up flash as well as the buttons and dial are not protected at all by using the armor further the rubbery material seems to attract dust i have put up with this product for almost a year and now i am looking for something else that will be easier to use and will protect my camera better

when i ordered this camera armor i knew that it was not popular but the price was reduced to under 700 and i thought i would gain if any part of it was usable alas i found no part worth using every part either falls off too easily makes camera use awkward and/or contributes nothing to protect the camera i believe that this product was honestly conceived and the best materials were used in construction it just does not work for me i ordered it to give it a try without high expectations i have no regrets

the armor does what it claims to do that is to protect your camera with a rubber coating that gives it a better grip just like having a nose mask for your car this product covers your camera with a nice protective shield all the buttons function normally except for covering the button labels so get to know your cameras buttons a little before putting on the armor the lense hood is too small for my canon 28 - 135 usm lense the only surprise was that i have to remove the base covering to replace the battery I am thinking of buying a second one for future use because i plan to keep my t1i for a long time i give it 4 stars because it is not tight fitting and you have to adjust it a little on occasion

does not have a tight seal sometimes the cover interferes when you try to attach the lens feels terrible in hand do not really offer much protection the bottom part is hard to install the lens hood is unusable because it is impossible to attach it on to the lens felt like i paid 30 dollars for a small piece of low quality rubber do not buy
this product has given me the freedom to carry my cannon camera in all conditions without having to use a camera bag the lens protector is excellent as are the other armor protection elements
nice product hope it will save my camera if i ever drop it it was easy to install and does not block any functions

the armor was easily installed on the eos rebel ti1 camera i have it works great and protects the vital parts of the camera I am througly satisfied with the product i have body armor on other cameras i have and found that it is a very good investment the armor makes the camera easier to grip and if you should drop it the armor provides some degree of impact protection

camera amour is excellent protection for my canon xsi the screen cover may be the best part of it one design flaw the lens hood does not stay on the lens unless you are using a filter otherwise an excellent product

i would not recommend this it interferes with the lense change does not work well with the flash the lense protector makes it difficult if not impossible to manually focus the screen protector is the only think that was worth a darn i paid 40 at wallymart i promptly returned it for my money back

i normally like glutino but their honey nut flavor is so boring and the texture is wierd apple cinnamon flavor is significantly better so if you are buying one of the two definately go with the apple cinnamon however the best gluten free cheerio is perkyos frosted cheerio amazon why is it not for sale on your site perkyos is excellent in size of the o as well as taste in my opinion the frosted perkyo is better more flavorful than the original brand but amazon needs to sell both especially for the young toddler that needs just the right size for their little fingers the original is a good choice for them as well as for those of you who do not like sugar much

my son loves these thank goodness they hold up well in soymilk for ceral in the morning and also hold up well in snack bags he is constantly needing o shaped cereal for projects at school and these work great they are a bit sweet but he does not mind

I am a very picky person i use to love cereal every morning until i had to go on the gluten free diet until this product i just gave up on cereal because i just did not like the taste of other cereal either they were just so hard or too fake in taste and chocolate cereals got old very quick but this honey nut sans gluten changed all that absolutely the best cereal i have come across and still have not found any other cereal to meet it is caliber my toddler who is not gluten free loves it i also found that when crushed you can use this as a noncooking pie crust or any recipe that requires bulk bread or graham crumbs

i almost did not buy this from my local high-end grocery store because the price was so outrageous but I am glad i decided to go for it this is one of the better gluten-free cereals I have had it is not just like cheerios of course but it has a pleasant taste of it is own with just the right amount of sweetness added to make it flavorful it does not get soggy immediately like some gluten-free cereals nor does it have that familiar cardboard texture those of us with celiac know all too well this product seems to have avoided the usual gluten-free problems and i give the makers credit for that i think it could have a little more cinnamon taste to it of course i can always just add some myself and the price is still high compared to similar gluten-free cereals regardless of where you buy it but i think it is definitely worth trying if you are on a gluten-free diet and need something palatable I shall buy this again

ok i can not stand these things but my babies love them so i gave it 2 stars not one first of all it is just puffed corn like peanut puffs if you have had those by envirokids and that would not be so bad if they did not taste like you were licking a cinnamon stick or putting a teaspoon of ground spice in your mouth for being all natural it sure does pack an unpleasant wallop watch out maybe the honey nut is better

this girlfriend cereal is decent does not get soggy easily and is relatively good i was a huge fan of apple cinnamon cheerios before going gluten free and these really do not compare well but the cereal does not taste like cardboard and does not have the weird gluten free taste to it and is actually pretty good

this cereal is slightly better than the apple cinnamon version because it is honey nut and it tastes very close to honey nut cheerios my toddler son and my gluten eating husband both eat it it is a good price also compared to prices in the store the only thing is you have to buy it in bulk but if you are like me that is ok because you will go through it or you can share with other girlfriend friends

this cereal while not exactly the same as cheerios is very very close and even my husband who is not girlfriend eats it it is perfect for girlfriend families especially those with a toddler who is needing to eat cereal and be gluten free good buy for the price also

honey nut cereal is my sons favorite it is the closest to cherrios it is great to throw in a suitcase for a trip sometimes hotels have only continental breakfast you can byoc-bring your own cereal and use their milk very good
we love it tastes great and can be used as a snack also just like cheerios only better because it is gluten free fast ship i would recommend this cereal to everybody you will not be disappointed
i have tried a lot of girlfriend cereals and this is the best one i have encountered since i started a girlfriend diet two years ago

our 2 year old son is affected by celiac disease and since his diagnosis we have had a difficult time finding snacks that are easy to take out on a play date or to a park the glutino apple cinnamon rings serve that purpose very well for us and he loves them they do not taste like your typical cereal that contains flour of course they do not but for someone who is on a gluten free diet and is accustomed to way the way that processed gluten free food tastes these are a great quick snack

i bought these plainer box at a whole foods definitely not worth the 429 i paid for them they are so bland like someone lightly and i mean lightly sprinkled bits of cinnamon and dried apples over cardboard there are no vitamins added either so there has little health value they could have at least put some vitamins in there to make eating flavored cardboard worth it I shall probably just eat this box as a snack alternative to potato chips i can not afford to just toss them will not be buying them again
bought this cereal at the store does not taste like nut and honey very disappointed just tastes like they used cheap ingredients will not buy again

i order this cereal via subscribe and save and always have to order a new case before the actual new ship date i can not keep this cereal in the house it seems like i order 6 boxes and then i turn around and we are down to the last one my kids love this cereal i love this cereal it hits my sweet tooth just right when i momentarilyaway from my healthiest eating habits but do not want to sink all the way down into actual junk food also it is nice to have a gluten-free cereal that youngcan use to make cheerio necklaces and other craft projects

when i read the reviews on the products i like to believe there is some truth to it but serious this cereal just taste awful this was another gluten free product i tried based on the many positive reviews it is called honey nut am i correct yet it tasted like i can not even discribe the words nothing like i ever tasted is it just me had to give half of my boxes away what a waste of money I am getting so disappointed in this new gluten free stuff i think I shall just switch back to my normal foods can anyone out there make anything gluten free that is not disgusting come on

this cereal is high in calories has essentially no fiber or significant nutrients and does not have either good taste or texture the serving size is 1/2 cup and packs 120 calories for that small amount I am returning mine
wow-threw this away after one bite chemical sticky sweet smell the cereal is translucent wow i will stick with g-free chex light years better than this
i was optimistic about this but neither the people nor the dogs would eat this cereal we threw out all 6 boxes
i bought these for my son because they are gluten free he seems to like them i thought that they lacked taste i would have preferred a little more cinnamon taste

it smells rancid it tastes like rancid granulated sugar it is too sweet the texture is bad and it has zero flavor it looks absolutely nothing like what has on the box i tried one kernel and spit it out could not even swallow it I am very mad i wasted my money on this product

if you used to love cheerios before having to go on a gluten free diet you will love these great with sliced banana or other fruit i prefer the honey nut to the apple cinnamon one of the better tasting and better textured gluten free cereals in my opinion we all know comparing gluten free flour products to wheat products is like comparing apples and oranges but after years on a gluten free diet a product like this is a darn good substitute
i bought these in the grocery store and could not even eat one bowl they were too hard too sweet nasty flavour i was sooooooo disapointed super gross
i bought this cereal for my kids ages 6 and 7 who can not eat gluten any more they will not eat it i think it passes to at least finish the box but my kids would be happy to throw it out
flavorful and a great substitute for honey nut cheerios texture a bit airy my children love it too
these beef sticks have a great flavor and the price seems fair there is no label stating as to where this product needs to be refrigerated

all natural beef but too soft for my taste does not have the snap and drier outer surface that some like this is a matter of personal taste the product is good just not for everyone i suggest trying this companys old fashioned cold-smoked beef-sticks strong hickory flavor a good bite of spice and drier texture this company has superb customer service

i could not resist the price so many beef sticks for so cheap however i think i was expecting something different the jerky has a good taste and at first it was not very oily but as they got older and exposed to the air i did notice some oil spots forming through the casings of the sticks overall if you can consume this say within 1 week of opening they are great if you need something that will stick around longer stick get it then maybe this is not the right product they also sent me a free sample of some of their other products with my order and the shipping was quick i like the company the beef sticks just were not what i was looking for i guess

beef sticks and honey what a great combination the ole smokies beef sticks are full of flavor adding honey gives them a little twist of sweetness that just puts them over the top the honey stung ole smokies are always a favorite with our friends the saddlebag pack is a perfect take-along to football parties

these are not spicy they taste great and have a mild spice if you have ever had the spicy sausage the mama brand from astation that is the spicy-taste you would be familiar with the product was incredibly fresh and i will not hesitate to try other flavors fantastic snacks and they are very similar to the jack links 99 cent beef stick although slightly sweeter at a much better price these are jack link quality not slim jim

price is great i thought they were ok but my sons loved them
the best honey beef jerky every just ordered again

these have actually gotten a lot better than they used to make them before the meat sticks were a more uniform cut thinner stock now they are thicker with a darker skin that leiterally gives a snap when you bite into them with the thicker skin it seems to retain more flavor they also seem to have a more moist feeling to them where in the past they tended be slightly drier feeling some might think this is more greasy but that adds to the flavor after all we are here for the flavor and not for healthy snacks the teriyaki tend to be a bit sweet tasting try the honey stung flavor which is also great but not as sweet
these are absolutely fantastic knew right on the first snack that these would become a staple in my household delicious and great buy

very taste get for those tring to lost weight and control your protean shard them with friends and now they are buying it too

highly inconsistent product the one saddle bag tasted wonderful was juicy with a delightfully sweet teriyaki flavor the second saddle bag literally tasted like dog treats it was not just one or two sticks the enter half was awful this company needs to higher someone else in

i am not generally one to leave a review much less a bad review but these honey stung literally leave a bad taste in my mouth i wanted to like them and the first bite is not bad because you taste the sweet but then the flavor turns into something that the dog literally thinks twice about seriously he kinda looks at me like really let us it sit for awhile and then will eat it this is not what he does with any sort of meat i guess i can thank you for the expensive dog treats

rubbery greasy and texture is weird if you can get past those issues taste is eh ok not super spicy but gives a warm kick they would probably be better if they were not so limp and as i mentioned rubbery i tried letting them dry out a bit microwaved put them in the fridge and even tossed one on the grill still no change they are only about four inches long so it is amazing how these things droop over for being so short if they tasted better maybe that would not be a big deal but it is

i love these things i used to order from an ebay seller but they quit handling the honey flavored ones i went to order the buffalo bills honey ones here on amazon and noticed these teriyaki ones I am glad i ordered these along with the honey ones the honey ones are not as sweet as the ones on ebay were even although i tracked them down to the same manufacturer it was a different city listed on the package so either i got the mild variety or my taster has changed the honey ones were still good although i could not detect much honey flavor detected this review is really for the teriyaki meat sticks the bad thing about these teriyaki meat sticks is that they are somewhat addictive in fact i should end this review so i can order me some more really thanks choo choo r snacks inc

bad not good this is terrible tasting it has the texture of patee and teriyaki flavor was not there thought it would be a good deal for the price but i wasted my money I am going to give it to the homeless person i see too bad I am a huge fan of teriyaki beef jerky

too soft for my taste reminds me of the smell dog jerky was looking for replacement for jack links beef stick original 36-count bag pack of 2 335 oz since it is not for sale anymore i guess i need to keep looking

first of all i would like to thank buffalo bills for gracing the world with their ability to craft the common cow into something more than steak burgers and ribs they made the best beef stick I have ever tasted cowboy style smokies twisted on the ends this is the real deal these little fellas are the perfect snack on that long cattle drive or between rodeos every bite has that perfect snap when you bite into it do not even try to compare these to any inferior meat stick these ole smokies are the bees knees of the meat industry john wayne clint eastwood chuck norris and john bassalone would be proud

this product was great no gristle meat was tender the taste was great well worth giving it a try we enjoyed eating them

the outside of these is simply perfect for a mild meat stick the honey gives it a nice sweetness and the wrapper has a nice snap to it when you bite into it the inside however tastes almost exactly like a slim jim i find slim jims to be a guilty pleasure so i was ok with this but these do taste like they are made of cheaper fattier meat than what i prefer so i probably will not be buying this product again if you really like slim jims give this a shot otherwise i would pass giving it a four because it is exactly as advertised and quite tasty just not exactly my thing
or just fake tasting beef sticks either way they were terrible 2nd star for edibility during times of extreme hunger / famish
these are some of the best tasting jerky sticks I have tried but i could not get the taste of heart out of my head after reading the ingredients something of a personal problem although

soft mushy moist these are the tree words that best describe these sticks i was definitely expecting these sticks to be dryer and chewier the flavor is pretty good but the texture makes these a thumbs-down for me

addictive delicious much better than the slim jims some other reviews have likened it to i got one of these in 4 days ago and it lasted for all of 2 and a half days i just ordered another package these have a high fat content which you can taste when you bite into one the taste is predominantly salty with a spicy kick and a noticeable but not overpowering hint of honey additionally there is a subtle acid bite these are good right out of the bag but they can also be used in cooking i chopped a few up and added them to pancakes delicious they would probably also go good in breakfast burritos cous cous or rice you can not go wrong with these babys
the meat has a creamy texture like biting into a stick of brie cheese principal ingredient is pured cow hearts each stick has 14 of the usda daily fat allowance i would not feed it to my dog
guess it is just personal preference but do not like them ended up giving them away and using them as dog treats
i think these are great but the packaging is so so it is a bulk pack they are not individually wrapped you have to put them in smaller ziploc bags to keep them from going stale
these were a very good value compared to convenience store beef sticks a bit mushy could be drier i keep them in fridge
good light taste not too strong of a flavoring and very little if any aftertaste they go down easy mmmmm definitely happy with the purchase

i learned about these from a co-worker after he made a bulk purhcase of several kinds of beef sticks a year ago he spread them around and so i got to sample a variety I have ordered the honey stung four times since then two other co-workers have also ordered them on several occassions this past year and they are believers too additionally we have all ordered several of the buffalo bills brands and they are all superb as long as you do not eat the whole bag I had also call these atkins friendly as well as that is also a motivator for me ordering these so many times other than them being just being great well-seasoned snacks buy em you will love em
i enjoyed this product they are a good value for the amount you get i did not sense much honey in the product so a bit more flavor would be nice i would buy again
i although it was fresh moist however personally alittle to sweet for me i think i 'll stick with the john wayne brand jw brand is more expensive but it seems to soot my taste buds better

i was a little skeptical on ordering the teriyaki sticks version based on a couple of reviews but i am happy i did they were a soft stick as someone said but had a nice crunch when you bit in the teriyaki was milder than others i have ordered and they were more smokey but they are called ole smokeys i did not get the greasy mouth feel that someone said and it did have a pleasant tasting after taste all in all worth a 4 rating but it could be a 5 based on individual tastes

these snacks are very different than say slim jims they are moist and seems less processed than many of the convenience store meat snacks out there there was a nice hint of spice laced with honey i would say they tasted and had a texture that i might have expected in a more expensive product i will buy them again and will recommend them to friends and family

i bought the buffalo bills teriyaki ole smokies beef sticks because i absolutely love beef sticks especially teriyaki and i thought this would be a good buy good quantity for the price the teriyaki beef sticks themselves were very tasty and flavorful i also loved the texture it was very soft and tender the only bad thing I had have to say about this product is that it leaves me with a very greasy fatty residue all over the rood of my mouth which kind of takes away from the flavor and my ability to fully enjoy the product aside from that i may still order it again

i purchased the honey stung smokies and some of the reviews stated that they were mushy i would not go that far but they are softer then most beef sticks but they still have a snap to them the taste is great even the picky kids liked these smokies-i think we will try some of the other flavors plus order these again
really great snack for hiking or a baseball game my son and i enjoy taking them when we go on a road trip to hold us over till we find a good restaurant

not too sweet but sweet enough and refreshing with a nice little carbonated kick this energy drink is a very welcome deviation from other energy drinks out there that i quite frankly can not stomach also the ingredient list is actually true to it is name healthy imagine that the first seven ingredients are a variety of fruit juices and water then other than caffiene and stevia the healthy sugar additive that actually possesses antioxidant properties and a little carbonation that is it this is one energy drink i will gladly keep on hand
was not a fan at all brought a 12 pack and barely drank one anyone want it only tried the apple but probably will not try the others it tastes like fake apple like a green blowpop even tho it is real

i sampled this last week when i was walking near bryant park in new york city and the marketing people were handing out free samples full cans of jamba juice energy drinks i grabbed one since it was free and i was really thirsty the drink did not tasted good i could feel the sour taste and low level of sweetness like it was sweetened with aspartame i drank about half of the can and threw the remained into the rain drain grate on the street i would never pay for this drink but i would accept it for free to clear my throat when i am thirsty

i really enjoyed this product some energy drinks have negative side effects for example headaches shakes terrible taste and more i found jamba to be both flavorful and gave me a noticeable increase in energy without a killer headache or the shakes

i have a cup of green tea every morning and that is enough to keep me going since i was sleep deprived i thought it would be a good day to try jamba strawberry banana energy drink the taste was better than i anticipated like real juice very slight carbonation with no detectable aftertaste i had it along with my lunch at 1 pm wish i had known that the 80 mg of caffeine it contains is about 3 times as much as in a cup of green tea i need to stay awake til about 11 pm but i hope it does not keep me up all night
it is impossible to rate this product as we never did receive it i have friends that use it and like it but i have no personal experience with it

i really did not enjoy the taste of this energy drink at all i thought it was a too sweet and then there was this bitter after taste at well it is also a very small can especially in comparison to a lot of other energy drinks out there in the market so even if it had tasted very good i still would not have thought this was an ideal choice

needing a mid afternoon jump start at work i have tried various sodas fruit drinks teas and so called energy drinks that were ranged from awful to so-so i was never impressed with one product to try it again the crisp but not overly sweet taste combined with a still hit of caffeine that did not make me shaky or interfere with night-time sleep made this a winner for me i did not notice any aftertaste and it did not the cloying flavor of regular apple juice it will be included in my supplies that get me through a long work day enjoy

if you like the taste of some of the other bull-ish energy drinks than enjoy if you like the energy from those other drinks but would rather drink something a little more palatable you might want to try the jamba juice energy drink no it does not taste like apple juice but there are enough hints of apple to drown out most of the nasty caffeine flavor that is usually present in these drinks if this does not sound like a ringing endorsement that is because it is not that said if you are going to use energy drinks this is a pretty good one

a crisp delicious beverage to give me a buzz without making me feel guilty for drinking from some large dressed up purple can covered in bolts of lightning i love jamba juice smoothies and the energy drink did not lower my opinion of the sweet and healthy treats apple may not be my favorite flavor and the can was too small to give me complete satisfaction but it was crisp delicious and came in a very nice looking can

jamba juice is pretty well known in new york city as having great fresh made fruit and vegetable drinks I am a fan so when i got out of the subway station one morning to find a group of people handing out free samples of these canned juice energy drinks i figured I had give it a try based on reputation I am not big on energy drinks if i want a lift coffee is my go-to i was sorely disappointed i could not even get past one sip if i want apple juice I shall just go and get me a regular old apple juice thank you I am not big on artificial sweeteners and while I am aware that stevia is natural it still has a strange taste to it even my boyfriend who has gotten used to beverages with stevia said he could not get past the first few swallows either it tasted unnatural to him as well both of us unknown to each other threw them out in the garbage jamba would have been better off canning some of their delicious juice drinks instead that i would buy

identification rather take a nap or have a coffee the flavor of this was so uninteresting i even like apple cider but this tasted like something you try once and forget about the labeling of drinks as energy drinks is such a joke half of these products probably only manage to irritate the body you are better off taking a nap or like i said having a small cup of coffee or tea jamba juice totally missed the mark on this one it tasted off and would have been even more disappointing if i paid for it

this jamba juice energy drink is tasty and refreshing with a nice tangy aftertaste to it the energy drink did not give much of a boost but i did not feel particularly slow after drinking it either maybe it just gives you even keel of energy than others where you get a noticeable boost and a noticeable crash later in the day too

i ordered thisbased on the jamba juice name and was pretty disappointed i like tart apples but this is not enjoyable at all i did not notice a significant increase in my energy either i drank it during a break at work glad i got to try one for free not worth the price

the jamba juice natural energy drink in the crisp apple flavor is very tasty the flavor reminds me apple cider i like it a lot and will purchase it if i can find it stores which i have not been able to in my area hopefully it will arrive soon 4 stars

i know that a lot of people are enamored with energy drinks these days I am not one of them most of the energy drinks out there might as well be battery acid for the flavor and I am not sure why anyone would drink one save for the fact that it provides a boost through copious amounts of sugar and/or caffeine and/or taurine and more etc however jambas entry of crisp apple is quite delicious and refreshing even as a simple beverage I am not normally inclined to drink energy drinks but i could easily see drinking something like this on an a regular basis i highly recomend this

jamba crisp apple is aptly named the slender 84 oz 248 ml can has 90 calories 20 g of sugar and 80 mg caffeine there are 22 total carbs with 80 mg of caffeine it has a little pick me up it is best served chilled the flavor is good but has a slight aftertaste which is not wholly unpleasant maybe the aftertaste is the stevia it is carbonated and not too sweet it is 70 juice i shared a can with my husband his comments were sour but sweet he asked if it was diet i told him about the stevia and he said that was probably the taste he was noticing overall i like it it is the type of drink i might get at a sandwich shop more than purchasing a case

this is the second flavor i have had of the jamba juice energy drink line i like this one even more than the last if you like apple you will like this product it is full of flavor and tastes great it is not gritty or over carbonated like a lot of energy drinks it tastes natural and delicious

my review is impacted by the use of this coffee and brew method not on the sole quality of the taste we bought two ekobrew baskets a can of the sumatran and one of the honduran when the sumatran refused to brew a full cup we contacted the company received a nice email that explained the grind was pre ekobrew and they admit to it not working well with their single serve basket that being said they apologized and suggested for us to use less coffee with a smaller cup setting as well as offering us a refund for the inconvenience so I am not sure if the taste is fantastic enough for more than two stars since i can not brew a proper cup with their own product i gave them an extra star for customer service

mighty great coffee awesome one day sale pricing and cool old fashion packaging one problem liked to never of broken into the goods that top was really glued on not good for old farts with bad hands a rusty knife may work but i sure do not want to cut some precious coffee packets some kind of pull string like on those old dog food bags or a ductape seal would do the trick well shiver me timbers i just learned via another old fart that there is a secret passage into the ekojava coffee chest by golly there has a hidden perforation under the label no signs or maps about two inches down from the top that opens the goods real smart just run a fingernail around the perforation and twist the top right off who would of ever guessed now more java for me mates

this product is not for everyone it is high in fat and is perhaps a little too salty for many on a restricted diet for those of us who grew up in the south in the 40s through the 70s this was a staple at the breakfast table we did not have it everyday but when we did it was a treat the secret to making this sausage taste right is in how you prepare it first do not use a pan that will allow the sausage to stick use either a well seasoned cast iron skillet or a non-stick frying pan heat it until the sausage turns light brown and starts to stiffen basically cook most of the moisture out of it if you are going to scrambleinto the cooked sausage mix between 4 and six into the pan do not over stir theor they will be mealy or crumbly again the secret is too brown the sausage for the best taste lastly this sausage may not be meant for everyone

while shipping was fast on this itemit is nowhere near being sausage in looks or taste i opened a can expecting sausage patties and to my surprise it was full of mush that looked like cat food and tasted nothing like sausage overall thisis a waste of money in my opinion even my dog refused to eat it

i was a little surprised by some of the really harsh reviews I have seen so far as well as some of the claims they do not fit the nespresso machine i have the delonghi latissima the older one not the new square one released last year and while it takes a little bit more force to close the door compatibility has not been a problem it is hard for me to imagine it fits one machine and not the others as for the coffee it is ok does not compete with that amazing vanilla seasonal variation nespresso released this past year but it is not as bad as the cherry variation either it is definitely not as strong as the ristretto or the appreggio but has much more flavor then the cosi and some other the other weaker blends i would most compare it to one of the new lungo blends taken as a short pour instead of the lung pour i have found them adequate to make my daily cappuccinos and honestly worth saving 30 per capsule against nespresso i will buy more

this is the second ecc product i have reviewed out of the two i liked this the best and felt it was really similar to the nespresso i have been drinking for awhile i think it is a milder version but i prefer that for this flavor i have had this flavor three days in a row and i seem to be a little less jittery compared to the nespresso version i would give this flavor a try and judge for yourself but i do think it is a good product with a good story
i received the espresso capsules and i love the fact that they are biodegradable the espresso tastes great great purchase

i have tried the cremoso and the espressivo and love them both great for a quick pick me up in the morning and early afternoon the taste is perfect for me I am not one to love extremely bitter espressos and this has just the right amount of humph another great thing i do with them when it is hot out and where i from it gets extremely hot is pour the espresso in a glass with some almond milk and lots ofso refreshing bonus is that the capsules are biodegradable one should always go that route when deciding what to buy

my office recently bought a delonghi espresso machine along with many varieties of espresso capsules to try out i was very excited as my love and pickiness of coffee and espresso has gone back many years since my first trip to france my definite favorite is the cremoso from ethical coffee company my mid-afternoon treat has quickly become a cremoso double latte the aroma and the taste are wonderful and it is the perfect pick-me-up to get through the rest of my day i have ordered a box of cremoso to have at my desk as my own personal stash my co-workers like several of the other varieties of ethical coffee but my hands-down favorite is cremoso an added bonus is that ethical coffee company the name says it all does not it makes their capsules envinronmentally-friendly and biodegradable i have been concerned about the millions of plastic capsules that are mounting up in our landfills i will always support a company that combines great quality with integrity and ethical coffee company seems to be the only company in the coffee genre that does

i really liked theof a cheaper capsule than nespresso offer with free shipping via amazon prime also i thought that the other reviewers were just being a bit sensitive after all coffee is coffee right uhhhh no i really should have listened to the other reviewers yes it is cheaper and yes it worked just fine in my machine and gave a fine crema but no i would never buy this again it tasted like a very weak watered down version of the real thing i guess you get what you pay for save yourself the money buy the real nespresso capsules and do not get stuck with 50 capsules of coffee that you are not going to drink yuck and can not return oh well lesson learnt
these capsules do not fit the delonghi nespresso machines the company indicated that they do not make a coversion kit either

hi does anyone know if these espresso pods work with a keuric sp machine or just the nespresso device figured i could buy them to use at work these guys drink so much coffee they probably would not notice how they tasted thanks i appreciate any help i can get do not want to deal with the hassle of returning if they do not work in our machine

new update well as it turns out the ethical coffee company has came through they contacted me about the problem i had and have replaced my machine so they do stand behind their word and will honor their guarantee it took a few weeks but they did what they said they would therefore i will continue to use their products

delicious espresso i was hesitant based on some of these reviews but had to give it a try no problems with the capsules fitting i am using a gran maestria there is a little popping sound as described by ecc but in my machine it is quite faint no problems closing you have to give it a more firm push than the nespresso capsules the flavor is rich and substantial enough for use in a latte or cap i have tried it as an americano as well and it works for me at this price what has not to like enjoy

i bought all five of the different types of ethical coffee capsules made for nespresso machines unfortunately 1 coffee flavor-marginal-not great 2 quantity of coffee-less in capsule than in nespresso capsule 3 we have a brand new nespresso pixie these capsules continue to get jammed in the machine and we have to reach in struggle with the capsule to pry it loose before we can make another coffee 4 since 10 capsules are packaged in one plastic sleeve the moment we open the sleeve air comes into contact with the remaining capsules minimizing their freshness bottom line is that the espresso coffee is not worth the lower cost to purchase these capsules

first off the pods jam in my brand new nespresso pixie it is easy enough to clear the jam but they should work without a screwdriver secondly the coffee is not very good as much as a like a lower priced option i have to suggest you stick with the authentic nespresso pods

so as a espresso fan and a nespresso owner for the last few years i was excited when i heard about these capsules but after trying them i was not impressed if you just want coffee and do not like it strong and do not pay much attention to the flavor these should be fine if good flavor and strength matter do not buy these

i thought i would give these a try since the nespresso caps are so tasty hence we go thru them quickly thought i would try a knock off for half the price not worth it stick with the real thing or try another alternative because these are weak watery and yucky maybe if i was try to ween myself off a nespresso habit but i am not so i do not enjoy them at all i tried the 3 strongest options and they were all week had to do short pulls and a 31 ratio was still not equal to 1 weak nespresso cap the shipping and service was great just not the product plus to add insult they dropped the price from 25 a box down to 10 at 10 try them yourself and you can taste disappointing brown water too

when i bought these they worked out to about half the price of nespresso pods i thought it was a great deal until i tasted the first shot this particular variety at least is very weak i ended up using two pods per shot and it still is not as strong nor full flavored like genuine nespresso pods even something mild like a 3 or 4 intensity my wife said they tasted like plastic and would not even drink them also i had some trouble with them jamming in the machine but learned to just eject them immediately after it was done this was with a pixie machine in short do not waste your money

I am not exactly an espresso connoisseur so i have a hard time telling a huge difference between these capsules and the nespresso ones in drinks like lattes unfortunately for less diluted drinks the weaker flavor in these capsules was pretty obvious they are not so much weaker that they are undrinkable but they are definitely have less flavor at the previous price of 25 cents / capsule these were an awesome choice for lattes / cappuccinos but for 50 cents / capsule I shall just stick with the nespresso capsules

i am not a coffee snob but this is clearly not espresso either i have a almost new citiz i used to prepare the drink half way through the brewing process the coffee is coming out light brown the coffee tasted like diluted weak coffee with no body or espresso aroma there was no crema either i tried it again with new capsules to make sure that the first one was not a defective capsule same result amazon does not accept return for this

ok so this is not nespresso swiss coffee it is however very drinkable and smooth and a perfect antidote to those sky high nespresso capsule prices hello nespresso are you listening i am eagerly waiting for starbucks to come out with their espresso capsule machine later this year it is going to be a category killer but until then I shall mix this coffee in sometimes after dinner and be none the worse for it thanks ethical coffee

what attracted me was the savings over nespresso capsules i so wanted to like these but the extraction is inadequate and espresso is weak and not as nuanced as most nespresso varieties since i paid 25 for the 5 boxes of 10 each the price has dropped precipitously now under 15 i can only believe that despite the pretty package and the eco-friendly claims nespresso users will pay a significant price premium to get the consistenly good if not great no mess aspects of using nespresso capsules i am reluctant to try other flavors after my experience with cremoso

i use nespresso roma and my wife uses nespresso ristretto we bought cremosa and espressivo as possible substitutes because lower per-capsule price free shipping with my amazon prime and i do not have to use the outpresso to recycle but we do not like the coffee others may prefer it I am sure but it is not for us too weak and we do not like the flavor the cremosa is especially watery versus nespresso I am cheap and maybe not as picky so i will use them up over time but after trying both cremosa and espressivo my wife will have none of it one of lifes little pleasures especially for her is good coffee and these are no substitute
