we got this for our 10-month old son and he loved it instantly he is just beginning to start cruising on things and this gave him a stable start he pushes it well and stays steady he also loves the mail slot and double doors that open on the front and loves to put everything inside a good purchase all in all

my son received this for his first bithday and has yet to get any good use out of it it has no balance capability so your child is always at risk of falling back also the door flaps are poorly made and always falling off basicly i do not recomend any one to buy this toy i would have been really upset had i purchased it my self

i bought this for my 10 month old daughter as she had been cruising for about 1 1/2 months and i thought she would enjoy having something to practice walking with and push I am not happy at all with the durability she is constantly pulling the mailbox slots off they come off very easily and has squished her fingers in them on more than one occasion once she pulls them off she likes to stand in the opening thing which looks really cute but it is really dangerous as i can just see her tumbling backwards she is not interested in the toy things the catepillar is too hard to move back and forth overall i wish i would have bought one of the fisher price walkers they seem much sturdier and do not have parts that come off so easily i would recommend you shop around before purchasing this one

my husband choose this activity walker because of the speed control feature thinking it would be safer on hardwood floors i expected a little tikes product to be sturdy but i am very disappointed in this one my nine month old pulled the mail doors off within the first minute he began playing with it i am also concerned with the safety the back wheels the back support is very unstable and appears as if they might snap off at the least amount of pressure i would not recommend this activity walker there are much sturdier and safer choices than this

my husband and i bought this toy for my 8 month old daughter we liked it because it was the only one on the market that had cruise control and we thought that would be important since we have hardwood floors we spent almost an hour putting it together and then we let the little one try it out at first she was so excited to play with the toys but as soon as she opened the mail box and started to climb up the the flap popped off and she fell on the front of the walker busting her lip needless to say it went back to the toy store and we bought the playzone activity walker she likes the colors sounds and sturdy craftsmanship better than the little tikes

this toy is an excellent tool for babies learning to walk it has a speed control which is great for hardwood floors the only problem is that the doors on the front are easily pulled off but can be placed back

i recently purchased this toy for my daughter she had so much fun with it until she leaned on the front of it and the pin that holds it open snapped and it collapsed causing her to fall and scrape her back we did not use it improperly i feel that we may have gotten a defective one since i have not seen anyone else complain of this problem i wrote a letter to little tikes today so i have not recieved a reply yet i just wanted to let you all know incase there is more than one defective one out there
this was a little tacky looking and felt cheap also we did not get a packing slip with it so we could not return it

this costume was fairly well made and was purchased as part of a dress up set for my 2 year old grandaughter it runs a little small but is very pretty it does fit her but just barely i think it is well made and perfect for little ones thewas bright and costume was soft
this did not fit my daughter it was too tight and it was too hard she did not like feel of the costume it felt like sand paper not worth a buy
got this little ballerina dress for my two year old daugther and she really loves it it has to be hand washed but it is so small that it is easy to wash in a few minutes i think it was a good buy

i love this ballerina costume for my 1 1/2 year old it came really fast and the quality was better than i expected it is great for playing dress-up i read that it runs a bit small so i got the next size bigger for her and it fits just fine with the exeption of the shoulder straps i have to pin them together in the back so they do not fall off her shoulders but it is very cute and i am very happy with it

cute quality is what you would expect for this price it is not going to be around forever but the toddler will grow out of it soon anyway the 1 1/2 year old that it was purchased for thinks she is a beautiful ballerina in it and loves it
loved it price was excellent for the quality
poorly made very tiny marked 2 toddler inside it said infant one year and two year what a difference very scratchy material i threw it away

the outfit is cute and my daughter was very excited to wear it it is cheaply made when i washed it all of this weird jelly stuff came off of it and the lace started to rip just from on wear and hand wash i would not recommend this product

my sister got this for my little 2 year olds birthday she was super excited and when she put it on it was a little snug my girl is 24 lbs so she is very petitie other then the size i think this is beautiful
ordered this for my niece who is 2 and she loves it it was too cute it is a halloween costume and the material is not very thick but it is definitely cute and the price was not bad either
my granddaughter loved this costume she put it on immediately and left it on all day wore it home
it would be best to buy an actual ballet outfit this one did not do it for me it seems cheap and ugly

bought this toy to be messing around with the food people in front of me had did not even get to try the joke before it broke minutes after opening it from it is wrap nevertheless hda fun the minute i played with it

purchased this as agift so i can not review as to how well they work for a magician but this was a funthat was packaged nicely and worked for the few times it had been used seems like it would last and does look like a real fork when it is not extended

the fork is a fun party trick and is durable enough for some good laughs however do not expect quality flatware here the metal is pretty thin and as another reviewer said you have to fork at an angle to prevent it from collapsing also the extendability makes washing just a little more challenging
this is fun to use during dinner when people know nothing about the fork reaching across the table to sample someone elses meal always brings on laughter
kind of hard to steal food without it collapsing if done at an improper angle if you figure that out it works fine also makes a wonderful back-scratcher and pointer
very poor quality the package came half opened and the back of the fork is rusted ok for agift for yourself if you do not want to give someone a rusted present
the material is kinda weak a bit disappointed
this for rusted after using it to get pickles from a jar disappointed that it rusted before i even washed it
great for family-style dinners you can taste something from everyone is plate without the rude reaching a must have
my fork arrived with a ragged indented area which was already rusty i understand this is a noveltybut i still expect better quality than i recieved my daughter is disappointed she can not use this

bought this as agift and it turned out to be a total piece of garbage broke before i removed it from the package i ordered a second one from a different seller turned out to be the same and broke on the first day as well poor quality do not buy i wish i could give zero stars
get one go out with friends eat the whole meal then ask your friends for their left overs and say oh not do not get up and extend this puppy it will bring the house down

i reached over laughing about to steal my boyfriends food and it broke immediately very hard to get any pressure to pick up a bite without pushing the fork back together kind of an oversight wish i got to use it at least once
cheap quality it will probably break any day now
never been easier to share my partners dinner
my aunt always eats off of everyone is plate and of course i had to by this for her for christmas great joke
quick delivery and product is what i expected
it broke immediately into 3 pieces and was not repairable

if you tug too hard it will come apart and it will never work right again there has not really all that much tension to indicate that it is fully extended my husband pulled it apart before even getting to use it for anything
these are not just a prank fork it is a daily aide for disability it allows a person unable to lift their arms to eat for them self

bought as agift has since turned into a must have once used at a buffet style lunch with friends mad them envious now we all have them good for reaching things a bit farther than your reach that your greedy friend will not pass can be used to get food from a distant plate to try as a sample from a willing / unwilling friend it is just fun

this was meant to be a funny birthday gift for my brother and initially it was fine when i took it out of the package and tested it however after i washed it off and took it to dinner as soon as i fully extended it the brackets on the inside of the end piece popped off and therefore it lost about 6 or so of extension coming apart the fork technically still works but we just have to be gentle with it however i do not think we can really fully fix it slightly disappointing
not as good as some of the other ones mfg cheaper and not as long not finished nicely either and more
we have bought many extendable forks for our friends they love taking them on vacations especially on cruises they are a great conversation piece
great fun for gatherings or to surprise those folks at the table next to you make sure there is one for everyone they disappear fast

i bought this to have a long fork to make bacon with on first extending it the rods pulled completely out of each other and would not go back in shoddy make this product is definitely a novelty and is not for actual use it does not wash well in the sink either
it is a inexpensive fork if you use it you may be called a dork reach out and take someone has meal you may just get smacked for real cheapcomes in a plastic bag

i bought this to actually use to trick people like others said it is too flimsy to actually stab food when extended i have an extendable spoon from another brand and it is well made when it is extended it stays straight and firm
bent on the first try by the recipient who tried to use it toy only not for use not sturdy waste of money
when we opened it up and extended it it broke this was a great giftso we were both dissapointed
thisis so primary that it does not merit comment as to it is use quality seems adequate and it works fine
i found it to be flimsy my husband likes it because he wanted a replacement it looks as if it has only a spot weld keeping the fork tines and the shaft together will see how many gags it survives
this extendable fork is the funniest thing ever people are very surprised when we pull it out at dinner everyone wants one once they see it in action

this was a fun gimmick toy while it lasted i used it to eat off a few peoples plates as a prank at a mens retreat i worked it is not very durable but for the price it was worth it i think i used it 4 times total before it broke in half where the telescoping portion attaches to the fork portion the telescoping portion is similar to the old school radio antennas and is somewhat fragile the fork portion came in completely flat like it had been stamped out of a flat piece of metal after some bending and prying i got it to resemble a fork adding to the realism of it
recommend to get the job done great quality easy to use fast shipping
i love the wii winter sports ultimate challenge game graphics are really authentic many games to chose from too great game to while away the winter time hours
it was hard to control your person in this game not alot of instruction it is sitting at the bottom of the games
bought this hoping it was like a game we had tried before really not much interaction on your part disappointing but the price was right so not a huge loss
this was a great buy and the kids i bought this game for the kids in my family i do not understand it but the kids do
it is a hard game to play i find i do not use it anymore i think you need to be alot more experienced than me at game playing

got this bundled cheaply with another game and actually enjoyed the game graphics are not all that great and the format for some of the events is rather odd at times offers an ok variety of the different winter sports but would have liked to see more overrall good game but kind of overpriced i got the game rather cheap and i did not find the game as whole to be worth what it normally would cost on average retail
was exactly as pictured this was a gift for my daughters boyfriend and he loved them would recommend this to anyone
good group of games hard to find my granson and i challenge each other routinely on the slalom course very challenging

this game is beyong difficult to figure out even the main menue is confusing not only that but controlling the characters in the game is a proccess in itself i would not reccommend this game for anyone under 14 years of age and good luck trying to figure it out

when i bought this i thought that it would involve a lot of activity and excitement however when i started playing i was really disappointed i agree with all the reviewers that say the graphics and everything is great but that is not what the point of playing the point is having fun and not thinking that what you are playing was a waste of money and frankly that is not what i think of this game for every sport curling bobsleighthere are different levels and they are pretty hard even for the easiest level also sometimes the controller does not work with it and it gets really frustrating the different sports are pretty boring to play and it does not require a lot of movement at all bottom line if you are looking for a fun and exciting game then you should not get this the sports should involve a lot of movement but instead you are just sitting on the couch holding the remote horizontally and tilting it side to side plus the game can be really hard sometimes and with the controller not working properly it just makes it all the worse save money do not buy it

thought these games would be more in line with the wii sports not so has a very annoying commentary instructions and choosing of game i bought for exercise and the only exercise anyone will get is in their wrists no fun at all
I am very disapointed in this game not fun at all and we did try to find something to like about it and sadly we could not
the game is very hard to move around and understand once you get the game set it is not much fun very disappointed in this game

what i hate about standard video games is having to remember what button to push when to make a character do an action that is why i love the wii the controllers allow true motion to determine the action but not in winter sport you have to pump controls and hit buttons and i just did not want a game like that i wanted to do the motions of skiing or lugeing or what ever not my cup of tea although I am sure it is a bunch of fun if you are used to that type of game it looks great

it looks like fun from the case but the actual game was complicated and blurry and hard to navigate through and even after we figured it out the games were not that fun i can see why someone wanted to sell it

i wanted to have fun with the game because the graphics are very nice to look at unfortunately the difficulty of the events even on the easy mode made it completely impossible to play downhill skiing looked fantastic but i was in the fence every 3 seconds the bobsled did better on it is own without me doing a thing now that is odd

i personally did not like this at all it was to difficult for the children ages 8 - 14 and they have not played it more than four or five times i was dissapointed with the whole things graphics are ok but the gaming experience is just boring

my favorites are the ski jump and the downhill skiing i have learned quite a bit about skiing from this game grew up water skiing not snow i would like for the events to be longer in length to produce a more sustained workout but overall i enjoy this game

this was a total waste of money the accuracy of the remote is poor on one game i just set the remote down and the event continued without any activity by me there is also annoying commentary throughout the events

the controls are lame the announcers and background music were annoying the announcers were hard to understand because the music was louder than their voices the only event that was interesting was the curling but i had the hardest time trying figure out the controls even something as simple as releasing the stone all in all it was pretty boring

this game needs a nunchuck and it is very difficult to manipulate the controls to follow the action my seven year old granddaughter was disappointed and she is an expert with other wi games that use the nunchucks

I am not sure what i expected from this game but it is not the game my kids go to when they turn on the wii we have all tried it in our family some of the games are fun and some are just too difficult to figure out I am not sure i would purchase this again if given the chance

this game is very good i find it to be more challenging and difficult than i expected the instructions are not very clear so i fell a lot luckily unlike real life skiing it does not hurt great game once you get the hang of the controls highly recommend

this game is a lot of fun but it is not exactly a thrill seat of your pants kind of game there are so many different games to play that you will be hard pressed to not enjoy something about this game the graphics are good the game play is good the controls are good my son loves it my daughter loves it it is a lot of fun and at this price it is a good value let the games begin

this game has many sport options however i do not enjoy it i did not really understand the instructions and the ones provided on the game are not very helpful all in all maybe as an amatuer gamer it is just not for me i was hoping it would be fun and it is just frustrating i guess my patience level is low for entertainment that is impossible on the ez settings i would only recommend if you think you can master any game

the game is poor at best it might be a good game if you want to spend a long time figuring out the controls and how to actually play each event but if not then stay away the controls are anything but intuitive and in some cases are just plain stupid and this really ruins the game I am all for games that offer a challenge but not ones that are close to impossible at first because the control system is so bad if you are thinking this will be a winter version of wii sports or something similar then you will be seriously disappointed

i did not like this game the graphics were very good but i really did not like the game itself i found it very hard to handle the controller with the games i was playing i just felt silly working the controller during the game play it was just odd i tried it twice and then sold it

we have tried this game several times mostly the skiing parts compared to similar games we have played on other platforms it stinks pass this up for a game that does not stink by the way 2 player mode stinks

i bought this game for speed skating and curling yes i am that much of a nerd but i love all the winter olympics sports the graphics looked pretty good in the preview so i thought i would love it i did not love this game controls were unresponsive and most of the games particularly bobsled and luge require no skill whatsoever most importantly after 5 tries i still can not get curling to work I am glad i got this game on sale i guess i should not have expected too much quality from conspiracy games
the game is very solid has excelent graphics and good sound there is an opening ceremony and medal ceremonies i really like this game very much
this game is missing the interactive excitement created in the ski jump snow board and ski race that the wii fit board brings to winter sports it is just not that fun

wii controller does not work properly with this game for example in alpine skiing i can not accurately steer in the direction i want it is very frustrating it is a huge waste of time the music and the graphic are okay i regret buying it i should have rented it mario and sonic at the olympic games is much better in terms of good controlling better graphic and more fun
it was hard game but when u know how to do the moves it becomes wow
fun game can be a good work-out if you get into it the curling is a tough one but i am still working on it
i have played this game with my grandkids there are 9 different exciting games in all this game is fun for the entire family

i so wanted for this game to be good i just could not sit and play it more than once the controls are horrible if you want to be frustrated this is the game for you graphics um bad the game had so much potential but it just did not deliver pass on this one

we had high hopes for this game but the bobsled / luge is way too easy and the skiing is way too difficult for bobsled all you do is tilt the controller one way or another and it is very simple to stay in the line that they display for you for skiing it is not too bad but unless you are extremely patient and want to practice a lot it is difficult to see any improvement in the short-term

honestly most of the sports are just too hard to learn the game my 10 year old liked theskating which is like dance revolution but with your hands but once she mastered it she was all done with that my six year old liked bobsled which is like a driving game but got bored with it pretty quickly even as an adult and knowing how to do most of sports personally i found it to hard to learn which makes the games not fun

i was expecting to get some more games in the spirit of wii sport but was rather disapointed by this game as we did not have much fun playing we have tried with the kids age 10 and 8 the various winter sport and failed to get excited

absolutely awesome i can not ski fast or jump long and the commentators keep saying i should have stayed in bed but it is so great anyway i just tell them shut up or I am trying it is pretty hilarious the graphics are amazing love the luge and skeleton figure skating is tricky requires grace and precision so no surprise there unbelievably real feel the speed thankful although that when i crash into the fences or fall off the jump I am not actually breaking any bones want to keep playing because i really think i might learn to win one day

i bought this game for my 12 year old son who is a big gamer he has played the game a few times he said that it is really hard to play i come from the generation of the atari so i can not provide any feedback just thought my sons opinion may help
lacks the intuitive control of other wii games some of the games are worthlessskating and curling are examples others are repetatively boring i would get my money back if i could

if you look at the reviews of various game sites outside amazon this games scores pretty badly i only read the amazon reviews although before purchasing and they seemed to be pretty good i thought it would be fun to do some 2 player skiing but you need 2 nunchuks for that and i only have one this game is not anything like the other snowboarding / skiing games where there are poweryou go off jumps build up your character and more there seems to be only 1 course / run / trail per activity skiing sleddingtoo so it gets pretty boring pretty fast if you are curious still i would rent this game before buying and you can see for yourself

i was really disappointed in the quality of this game after reading the reviews i expected more the controls are hard to get down you get the feeling that nothing you do affects what happens I am really having a hard time finding good wii games beyond wii sports and wii play

i have not been disappointed with the gameplay of winter sports i have been impressed with the graphics on each of the games that I have played the controls are somewhat complicated to master curling is very difficult to learn but i think once you take a couple of falls you figure out what exactly needs to be done the instructions for the controls on screen are not that great i would recommend reading the instructions in the manual first i do think this will be a great party game with our friends and family and at the price it will be one of the sports games we turn to
game is a blast will all the winter sports will keep you moving and are very challenging lots of fun for the whole family this is a game everyone will enjoy playing

we are fairly new to gaming we really like wii sports as well as race games for playstation like crash cart nitro wii winter sports is very difficult to use it does not seem to respond well to the controllers i would not recommend this game to novice gamers

except for figure skating most of the events are lots of fun the actions required in figure skating seem to have no relation whatsoever to the actual sport excelling at some of the events is quite difficult there is a high degree of arm movement required in many of the events although leg movement is unnecessary our favorite at this point is downhill skiing ghost competition against a family member in split screen is especially fun one improvement i would suggest is to allow direct competition between family members in curling one can play at the same time as another family member but never directly there is always an opposing computer-generated team i do recommend this game but be prepared in some events to spend a lot of time getting good at it

my husband bought this game because he liked the look of it he is not a video game player but i frequently see him playing this game it is a lot of fun to play we have not played it single yet because we are always playing against the kids it does take some practice to get the hang of the moves but it is well worth the time put into it you will be skiing down the hills in no time
hours of fun for the person that loves to watch the winter olympics and dreams of skiing the slopes

overall good do not expect anything out of this world but i like the ski jumping figure skating kind of sucks but there are plenty of games to choose from some are easier / mindless and some are a little bit more tricky like downhill skiing which i have yet to figure out hope this helps
i was expecting more eximent from this game i read the reviews and they praised on how good of a game this is I have seen way better games

this game does take some patience in learning and getting better at each event however you will find that many of the events are rather fun such as the luge bobsled cross country and ski jumping although I am still trying to figure what makes me really jump farther especially notewothy is the curling you can actually play a full 9 frame match with 8 stones each frame either against the computer or another team this curling event can actually wind up lasting 1 - 2 hours so it is no half-hearted slap-together event very cool for those who enjoyed watching curling at the last winter olympics the curling in this game will prove to be well worth the price of the game for a fan who enjoyed the basic bowling provided with the system i find the curling to now be one of my favorite wii events to play

there is a need for patience to get the hang of the controls but after that this is really a fun game after having gone through all 15 games once i think the alpine skiing and bobsledding type games have the most replay value i have to agree that there is not much to theskating game after playing it three times i do not think i will venture that way too often the downhill races whether skiing or bobsledding are a lot of fun and get my game adrenaline going i have now gotten the hang of skiing through the gates and am trying to get my 20 coins on the alpine super g when playing this game alone i lose at spider and bobsledding everytime but mostly beat my better half in the down hill skiing neither of us have gotten the hang of the single player skiing circuit and keep getting disqualified we still have to figure that one out this game will have my attention for a while as i am very competitive and determined to win all events

I am amazed at how realistic the downhill racing feels the rhythym and excitement of htting the gates is intoxicating something i would not dare do with this 60yo arthritic body but it brings back many thrilling memories of younger stronger charges downhill other sports are fun too some of the instructins are inscrutable I have done curling a few times but do not have a clue how i got it started that is frustrating wht don y they ever tell you how to exit the game seems like a conspiracy to keep you playing
game had potential but has no lasting entertainment value will not come out of the cover often now that christmas is over

this game is like most wii games terrible such a waste of 50 i would highly suggest renting games or reviewing them extensively on objective websites impulse buys with wii games have yet to do me right
this game is very fun and quite a challange for the entire family would recommend purchasing
this game is amazinly fun but be careful you will be sore the next day arms and back from playing so much another wii hit

my husband and i are addicted to this game our favorite are the ski jump and the bobsled the directions seem a bit complicated for some of the games but once you try them a few times they are easy to handle we think this is a great addition to our wii sports games as we love the interactivity and the multi-player options of these games for parties family events and more
this game offers an extension of traditional wii sports i love the skiing especially and at 30 it is hard to beat
great action and fun controlling the performance of the skaters skiers and all the events highly recommended

for once it seems conspiracy has done something worthwhile conspiracy is the publisher for this game known to create the most painfully bad experiences on the wii to date seriously check reviews of their other games but this game is surprising well designed and thought out the graphics are actually up to par with the other wii games on the market the whole game itself iplays like mario and sonic at the olympics were you have the opportunity to do several games in sequence or just pick one at a time the controls are much more intuitive so therefore the experience is more engaging and overall better the individual events can actually take some time to complete which makes the game alot more playable for 30 dollars this game is a steal

another fun little adventure game for the younger set this adventure game is very similar to the first nancy drew ds game and while this game has it is flaws the adventure portions are quite good and fun to play the look is similar if not identical to the first nancy drew ds game and plays like it too the mini-games are back and can get a little boring after a while for me the game was very simple and alot of fun so if you want a fun little game for on the go entertainment for younger gamers this one will be fine flawed but easy to play on the go so if you liked the first one you will like this one too
i really do not like these ds nancy drew games they are just really boring i would much rather get a nancy drew game for the computer
i bought this game off the sale rack at target i thought it would be interesting since it is nancy drew i was wrong the game is tedious and boring i lost interest with it very quickly
i do not agree with other positive reviews got stuck every 10 min searching all the levels for a clue that is not found anywhere bored disapointed so i turn the game off waist of money and time

the only thing i have to say about these game it that it would be a great game for very young girls that would be interested in nancy drew compared to the her interactive nancy drew games this games was and epic fail

the game is fun but at two different places i got stuck and had to re-start the game once when i got to theto talk to doyle to try to find his cat i had not gotten the fish in the village so could not get the key for the boat and could not go anywhere else either i was stuck in about 3 scenes and could not get out i had to re-start the game the 2nd time i was on the roof of the lighhouse and got stuck in the corner and could not move i tried and tried but was stuck in that corner once again i had to re-start the game and for those of you who have played the game you know that is near the end very frustrating the game is fun and i enjoyed playing it a great deal but it does have some glitches in it at least mine did

this nancy drew game is definitely better than the first one if you have not played the first one do not buy it for yourself try it first from someone else but if you have not played this one yet definitely buy it for yourself it was very entertaining and you are not just on the mansion grounds the whole time you get to go to a womans house a town to explore and you get to drive a boat and scooter you solve this game yourself and the game does notyou other places automatically you have to find clues and converse with people before you go anywhere if i were you i would definitely buy this game not a major disappointment do not listen to other reviews about how it was ok because it was better than ok it was challeging and made me think it rocked happy sleuthing

remember that this perspective is coming from a 37 year old woman i reviewed the other nancy drew game and I shall review the hidden staircase after i master it this weekend no challenging feat I am not bragging i liked this game it was a bit longer than the last one and if you are familar with the mini-games they really have not changed the story was better and i have to admit i had to locate a cheat to figure out how the grandfather clock worked for adults this game is like a cheap novel you can finish it in a few hours it is fun requires very little brain-power and it takes your mind off of the real world i do not have kids but my neighbors teen beats us at halo and everything else i would image this might bore video game junkies

the universal game selector arrived very quickly after my purchase when i first opened it it felt extremely lightweight and i was a little bit worried that it would be more likely to break than i thought once I had put 3 carts in it although that worry vanished I have had no trouble with it staying in my ds lite and removing the games themselves is easy it works without a hitch and i would say to gamers who like to play on-the-go and own a ds get one I am very pleased with my universal game selector i just wish that memorex had more products for the ds line
great product but it has a flaw the selector can com of easilly by mistake when playing certain games that require grip and us of the l1 and l2 buttons

i usually enjoy playing a thinking game that is based on a story like phoenix wright or professor layton straight through with occasional breaks to play a button mashing game like mario brothers or bejeweled this case was the perfect solution it allows me to store and keep the three games I am playing letting me easily switch between games now i do not have to carry around multiple game cases and switch cards in and out simply flip a switch to select one of three games the only thing i did not like was the fact that the unit could become disengaged from the ds player causing you to lose your game progress my solution i used double-stick tape to attach the unit more securely to the underside of the ds player even with the unit taped in place you can still switch game cards in and out of the three game slots

i really enjoy the convenience of this i love being able to switch between the three games only one shows up on the main screen and there is a switch on the back to choose which one you want to play the switch has just the right amount of resistance to prevent accidental sliding while playing a game however the insert is spring loaded almost you have to be really careful because any pressure on the game selector instead of the l or r buttons will because the game selector to be ejected and your game will be ended with no warning since i play games such as animal crossing and pokemon this ends my game promptly erasing hours of data that i was too focused on to stop for 5 seconds and save that is the only draw back as i can tell and the game selector does not add too much bulk to the actual ds console itself

i love the civilization series of games and beyond earth is no exception

this is another great title in sid meiers civilization series the graphics and animation are beautiful the variety of planets and landscape is great this game introduces a new non-linear technology web and it also introduces new concepts in diplomacy affinity and cultural synergies the one glaring flaw i find is with the ai players the good each seems to have it is own unique personality and affinities characteristics the bad the ai players often do not act in a rational or logical manner as with other iterations of civilization the ai players can go from being your friend to being your enemy and declaring war in one turn and with no warning I have played through it several times and the ai is not enough to make this a bad game but it could use some improvement in my opinion

take civ 5 remove everything that made each civilization unique then reskin it as a space game and you have got beyond earth actually beyond earth is worse than that they do not have good quotes from historical figures or books instead they are made up nonsense from fictitious people in the game you land on the planet and found your first city but you have nowhat the map looks like because your astronauts are too stupid to take a few photos from space before landing there are fewer victory types available for example cultural victory and diplomatic victory have been removed in this game

after putting in about 70 hours i am done i have tried and tried and tried again to like this game I am a huge space nut what can i say but in the middle of trying a buddy asked if i wanted to play civ v again it was like a breath of fresh air that playthrough called into question everything that is wrong with this game and i do not recommend beyond earth in the slightest at this point it is too confusing the basic combat unit advancement removes a huge part of research units the tech tree is not well done the resources are used extensively or not at all the list goes on it really was a good attempt there are varied and interesting map enhancements and the unique units are interesting enough but do not have enough unique abilities to make the anything other than better units and obviously the setting is something that is not done well enough but i keep going back to civ 5 ever since my buddy asked says a lot my suggestion is to wait until civilization 6 comes out and find a mod that puts a sci-fi skin on it

i expected more i was hoping for a really sophisticated universe-based game akin to the old masters of orion games instead it is almost exactly like other civilization games with futuristic names and aliens instead of barbarians really disappointing another problem i have with civilization games is they are all now steam-based even if you buy the cd / dvd version you can not even play the game without internet and a steam account one of the reasons i got into civ games was they were playable when i did not have access to the internet as a fun way to pass time in a hotel or in other situations when internet was not readily available honestly when the internet is on there has almost always something better to read / do / play i would not buy this again i doubt I had play it on steam even if it were free if it were playable offline I had give it 3 stars for fitting it is niche where i needed it but still failing to meet my expectations as a new game

this is a re-hash of civilization v with new skins for old game mechanics it is no great feat to beat the game and a simple and nearly guaranteed path to victory is hard-coded into it but worse still 2k / firaxis has patched the game to the point that it is unplayable on many systems with nvidia graphics cards that exceeded the both the minimum and recommended requirements and does not seem to care this is my last purchase of a 2k / firaxis game and i am submitting a request for a full and complete refund as the implied warranty of merchantability has been voided by the manufacturer

such a basic game hard to believe waited so long for something like this graphic are good but otherwise can not say much for it and I have playing civ since civ2 not many opponents engineers merchants and more I am used to in a civ game i really can not believe sid meier put his name on this

similar concept to previous versions i have to figure out the tech tree kind of confusing and not a really good format to know how to pursue tech or military or cultural you have discern it from the way it is presented and some of the options offered within each choice just as addictive as v and other versions on trades you get favors i have nohow to call those up or when they are used or how no good explanation on wonders so i keep wondering if it is worth it and what will you get from it do not regret the purchase but not that much better

definitely a worth addition to the sid meyers civ games more of a sequel to alpha centauri than civilization v however it is still very fun and adds quite an interesting new mix of game mechanics and playstyle options i find myself playing this game very differently than how i normally play civ 5 games which is good a must buy for any fan to the civilization series or sid meyers games all together

game would not install either by a too early game release or issues with the required steam site too many problems save your money until these bugs are removed i have worked with 2k to remove these issues although they are helpful is this to be expected following an expensive purchase

it is more like an expansion pack than a new game diplomacy functions much the same as civ v with the addition of exchanging favors also the spy interface is updated with more options i like the ability to terraform the landscape and the planetary resources are new and different once you adjust to thelandscape you it will feel very much like you are playing civ v instead of barbarians there are aliens instead of happiness there is health to contend with one of my favorite aspects of this game is the automatic unit upgrades as your technologies advance take advantage of trade routes to have ample resources to support units and buildings the technology web is somewhat confusing although well thought out good job overall four new and interesting ways to win in addition to domination victory
hidden on separate system requirements page requires internet activation and patch download should have been listed both on the box and clearly stated on amazon sales page fail to both 2k and amazon

a large disappointment i had hoped that it would be in the style of his other games

this long awaited sequel to alpha centauri definitely lives up to the hype we have had the game since the release date and have already logged many many hours into gameplay for fans of alpha centauri [ the original ] or the civ games this game is perfect for you the game was pre-ordered just a few days before the actual release date and was delivered right on time i would definitely recommend this game

i absolutely loved civ 5 and i was really looking forward to beyond earth I am not disappointed with the game or with buying it at full price but i do think that it still feels like atruthfully I had wait for it to go on sale before you pick it up in it is current state there are some bugs nothing breaking thankfully and i think that more content needs to be available to really help it live up to bar set by civ 5 and the hours and hours you can spend there

this is a preliminary rating i have attempted the game several times so far and was very pleased with the way it played and the concept of the game the graphics are rather blurry and dark unlike previous versions the problem that i have with the game is that it could not be completed twice i went all the way through the research and in spite of have the requisite object in place for the victory for over 50 turns it would not complete the victory there was no way to get help on the 2k site although there was a page to ask for help it would not allow me to enter anything i have been playing the civilization games since the first and have found them enjoyable this may be only a problem with the type of victory i attempted so will keep trying if it works i may change the rating
fun mostly what you would expect some new features a lot of old features remain yet had their names changed not enough work was put into the ai although remains decent 75/10
